 2277: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) ->
 2278:     {OS, _}         = os:type(),
 2279:     IsSocketBackend = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2280:     CPayload        = craasa_mk_payload(),
 2281:     SPayload        = "Whatever",
 2282: 
 2283:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2284:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2285:     {Client1, Server1} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2286: 
 2287:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2288:     {ok, Sender1} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, default,
 2289:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2290:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2291:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2292: 
 2293:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2294:     ok = inet:setopts(Server1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2295:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2296:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2297:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2298:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2299: 
 2300:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2301:     craasa_verify(default, Client1, SPayload),
 2302: 
 2303:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2304:     craasa_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2305: 
 2306:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2307:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2308:     {Client2, Server2} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2309: 
 2310:     ?P("populate 2 (true)"),
 2311:     {ok, Sender2} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, true,
 2312:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2313:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2314:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2315: 
 2316:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2317:     ok = inet:setopts(Server2, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2318:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2319:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2320:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2321:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2322: 
 2323:     ?P("verify 2 (true)"),
 2324:     craasa_verify(true, Client2, SPayload),
 2325: 
 2326:     ?P("cleanup 2 (true)"),
 2327:     craasa_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2328: 
 2329:     ?P("done"),
 2330:     ok.
 2331: 
 2332: craasa_mk_payload() ->
 2333:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2334: 
 2335: craasa_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2336:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2337:     ?P("create listen socket (server) with active = false"),
 2338:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false},
 2339:                                      {recbuf, 4096},
 2340:                                      {ip,     Addr}]),
 2341:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2342:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2343:     Opts = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2344:               is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2345:            end,
 2346:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2347:                            [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++ Opts) of
 2348:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2349:                      CSock;
 2350:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2351:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2352:         end,
 2353:     ?P("create accept socket (server)"),
 2354:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2355:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2356:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2357:     {Client, S}.
 2358: 
 2359: craasa_populate(OS, _ISB, _EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2360:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2361:     ?P("send payload (~w bytes) from client to server", [byte_size(CPayload)]),
 2362:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2363:     ?P("verify client socket queue size"),
 2364:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2365: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2366: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2367: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2368:     end,
 2369:     ?P("[server] send something"),
 2370:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2371:     {ok, undefined};
 2372: craasa_populate(OS, ISB,
 2373: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2374:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2375:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2376:                       end,
 2377:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2378:                                 craasa_populate_sender(
 2379: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2380: 				     true                       -> 1
 2381: 				  end,
 2382: 				  Client,
 2383: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2384: 				  CPayload)
 2385:                         end),
 2386:     receive
 2387:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2388:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2389:     after 2000 ->
 2390:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2391:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2392:             {ok, Sender}
 2393:     end.
 2394: 
 2395: craasa_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2396:     ?P("[socket, ~w] send payload (expect failure ~p)",
 2397:        [N, ExpectedSendReason]), 
 2398:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2399:         {error, ExpectedSendReason} ->
 2400:             ?P("[socket, ~w] expected payload send failure", [N]), 
 2401:             exit(normal);
 2402:         {error, UnexpectedSendReason} ->
 2403:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send failure: "
 2404: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, UnexpectedSendReason]), 
 2405: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2406: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload);
 2407: 	ok ->
 2408:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send success", [N]), 
 2409: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2410: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload)
 2411:     end;
 2412: craasa_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2413:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2414: 
 2415: craasa_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2416:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2417:     craasa_cleanup(Sender).
 2418: 
 2419: craasa_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2420:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2421:     receive
 2422:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2423:             ok
 2424:     after 0 ->
 2425:             ok
 2426:     end;
 2427: craasa_cleanup(_) ->
 2428:     ok.
 2429: 
 2430: craasa_verify(default, Client, Payload) ->
 2431:     ?P("[verify-default] client await server data"),
 2432:     receive
 2433: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2434:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2435:                "client received expected server data - "
 2436:                "now await socket closed"),
 2437: 	    receive
 2438: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2439:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2440:                        "received client socket closed"),
 2441: 		    ok;
 2442: 		Other1 ->
 2443:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2444:                        "awaiting client socket closed - received upexpected: "
 2445:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2446: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2447: 	    end;
 2448: 	Other2 ->
 2449:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2450:                "awaiting client socket data - received upexpected: "
 2451:                "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2452: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other2})
 2453:     end;
 2454: craasa_verify(true, Client, Payload) ->
 2455:     ?P("[verify-true] client await server data"),
 2456:     receive
 2457: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2458:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2459:                "client received expected server data - now await socket error"),
 2460: 	    receive
 2461: 		{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2462:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2463:                        "client received expected socket error - "
 2464:                        "now await socket closed"),
 2465: 		    receive
 2466: 			{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2467:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2468:                                "client received expected socket closed"),
 2469: 			    ok;
 2470: 			Other1 ->
 2471:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2472:                                "client awaiting socket closed - "
 2473:                                "received upexpected: "
 2474:                                "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2475: 			    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2476: 		    end;
 2477: 		Other2 ->
 2478:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2479:                        "client awaiting socket error - received upexpected: "
 2480:                        "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2481: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2482: 	    end;
 2483: 	Other3 ->
 2484:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2485:                "client awaiting socket data - received upexpected: "
 2486:                "~n      ~p", [Other3]),
 2487: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other3})
 2488:     end.

 2493: econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2494:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2495:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2496:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2497:                             Addr;
 2498:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2499:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2500:                     end
 2501:            end,
 2502:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2503:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr)
 2504:            end,
 2505:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2506:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2507: 
 2508: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr) ->
 2509:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2510:     {Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload} = craasao_pre(Config, Addr),
 2511: 
 2512:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2513:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2514: 
 2515:     ?P("[ctrl] populate"),
 2516:     {ok, Sender} = craasao_populate(OS, ISB,
 2517: 				    Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload),
 2518: 
 2519:     ?P("[ctrl] set server socket option linger: {true, 0}"),
 2520:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2521:     ?P("[ctrl] close server socket"),
 2522:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 2523:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2524:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2525: 
 2526:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2527:     craasao_verify(Client, Sender),
 2528: 
 2529:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"),
 2530:     craasao_cleanup(Client),
 2531: 
 2532:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2533:     ok.
 2534: 
 2535: craasao_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2536:     ?P("[pre] create listen socket with active = false"),
 2537:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2538:                          [{active, false},
 2539:                           {recbuf, 4096},
 2540:                           {ip,     Addr}]),
 2541:     ?P("[pre] listen socket: "
 2542:        "~n      ~p", [L]),
 2543:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2544:     ?P("[pre] create connect socket (~w)", [Port]),
 2545:     Client     = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2546:                                [{active,          false},
 2547:                                 {sndbuf,          4096},
 2548:                                 {show_econnreset, true},
 2549:                                 {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2550:                      {ok, CSock} ->
 2551:                          ?P("[pre] connect socket created:"
 2552:                               "~n      ~p", [CSock]),
 2553:                          CSock;
 2554:                      {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2555:                          ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2556:                  end,
 2557:     ?P("[pre] create accept socket"),
 2558:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2559:     ?P("[pre] close listen socket"),
 2560:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2561:     {Client, Server, craasao_mk_payload(), "Whatever"}.
 2562: 
 2563: craasao_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2564:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2565:     ?P("[populate,inet] client send data when"
 2566:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2567:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2568:     ok      = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2569:     ?P("[populate,inet] verify client socket queue size"),
 2570:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2571: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2572: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2573: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2574:     end,
 2575:     ?P("[populate,inet] server send data"),
 2576:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2577:     ?P("[populate,inet] sleep some"),
 2578:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2579:     {ok, undefined};
 2580: craasao_populate(OS, ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2581:     ?P("[populate,socket] entry when"
 2582:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2583:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2584:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2585:                                 craasao_populate_sender(
 2586: 				  if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) -> 2;
 2587: 				     true                         -> 1
 2588: 				  end,
 2589: 				  Client, CPayload)
 2590:                         end),
 2591:     receive
 2592:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2593: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2594: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2595:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2596:     after 2000 ->
 2597:             ?P("[populate,socket] send something"),
 2598:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2599:             {ok, Sender}
 2600:     end.
 2601: 
 2602: craasao_populate_sender(N, Client, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2603:     ?P("[populate,sender,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]),
 2604:     ExpectedSendRes = econnreset,
 2605:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2606: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2607: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] expected (payload) send failure", [N]), 
 2608: 	    exit(normal);
 2609: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2610: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected (payload) send failure reason:"
 2611: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2612: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload);
 2613: 	ok ->
 2614: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected send success - "
 2615: 	       "expected failure with ~p", [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2616: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload)
 2617:     end;
 2618: craasao_populate_sender(_, _, _) ->
 2619:     exit(send_failure).
 2620: 
 2621: 
 2622: craasao_mk_payload() ->
 2623:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2624: 
 2625: craasao_verify(Client, Sender) ->
 2626:     ?P("[verify] begin with"
 2627:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2628:        "~n      Sender: ~p", [Client, Sender]),
 2629:     is_pid(Sender) andalso
 2630:         craasao_verify_sender(Sender),
 2631:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2632:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2633:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active: once"),
 2634:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 2635:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2636:     ?P("[verify] expect client econnreset"),
 2637:     receive
 2638: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2639:             ?P("[verify] received client econnreset -> "
 2640:                "expect client closed message"),
 2641: 	    receive
 2642: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2643:                     ?P("[verify] "
 2644:                        "received expected client closed message - done"),
 2645: 		    ok;
 2646: 		Other1 ->
 2647:                     ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2648:                          "(expected closed): "
 2649:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2650: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2651: 	    end;
 2652: 	Other2 ->
 2653:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2654:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2655:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2656: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2657:     end.
 2658: 
 2659: craasao_flush() ->
 2660:     craasao_flush([]).
 2661: 
 2662: craasao_flush(Acc) ->
 2663:     erlang:yield(),
 2664:     receive Msg    -> craasao_flush([Msg|Acc])
 2665:     after     1000 -> lists:reverse(Acc)
 2666:     end.
 2667: 
 2668: craasao_verify_sender(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2669:     ?P("[verify sender] await termination"),
 2670:     receive
 2671:         {'EXIT', Sender, normal} ->
 2672: 	    ?P("[verify sender] expected normal termination received"),
 2673:             ok;
 2674:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2675:             ?P("[verify sender] unexpected termination: "
 2676:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2677: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_sender_termination, Sender, Reason})
 2678:     after infinity ->
 2679:             ok
 2680:     end;
 2681: craasao_verify_sender(_) ->
 2682:     ok.
 2683: 
 2684: craasao_cleanup(Client) ->
 2685:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)).
 2686: 
 2687: 
 2688: %% --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2689: 
 2690: econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2691:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2692:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2693:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2694:                             Addr;
 2695:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2696:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2697:                     end
 2698:            end,
 2699:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2700:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr)
 2701:            end,
 2702:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2703:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2704: 
 2705: do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 2706:     {OS, _}  = os:type(),
 2707:     ISB      = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2708:     CPayload = craasp_mk_payload(),
 2709:     SPayload = "Whatever",
 2710: 
 2711:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2712:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2713:     {Client1, Server1} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2714: 
 2715:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2716:     {ok, Sender1} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, default,
 2717:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2718: 
 2719:     ?P("close server socket (1)"),
 2720:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2721:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2722:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2723: 
 2724:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2725:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client1, default, SPayload),
 2726: 
 2727:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2728:     craasp_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2729: 
 2730:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2731:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2732:     {Client2, Server2} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2733: 
 2734:     ?P("populate 2 (default)"),
 2735:     {ok, Sender2} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, true,
 2736:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2737: 
 2738: 
 2739:     ?P("close server socket 2"),
 2740:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2741:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2742:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2743: 
 2744:     ?P("verify 2 (default)"),
 2745:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client2, true, SPayload),
 2746: 
 2747:     ?P("cleanup 2 (default)"),
 2748:     craasp_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2749: 
 2750:     ?P("done"),
 2751:     ok.
 2752: 
 2753: 
 2754: craasp_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2755:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2756:     ?P("create listen socket *** with option switched off (default)"),
 2757:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2758:                          [{active, false}, {recbuf, 4096}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2759:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2760:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2761:     COpts = [{active, false}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++
 2762:         if
 2763:             (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2764:             is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2765:         end,
 2766:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | COpts]) of
 2767:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2768:                      CSock;
 2769:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2770:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2771:         end,
 2772:     ?P("accept connection"),
 2773:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2774:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2775:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2776:     {Client, Server}.
 2777: 
 2778: craasp_mk_payload() ->
 2779:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2780: 
 2781: craasp_populate(OS, _ISB,
 2782: 		_EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2783:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2784:     ?P("[port,server] set linger: true:0"),
 2785:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2786:     ?P("[port,server] send some data to client"),
 2787:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2788:     ?P("[port,client] send some data to server"),
 2789:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2790:     ?P("[port,client] verify (port) queue-size"),
 2791:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2792: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2793: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2794: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2795:     end,
 2796:     {ok, undefined};
 2797: craasp_populate(OS, ISB,
 2798: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2799:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2800:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2801:                       end,
 2802:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2803:                                 craasp_populate_sender(
 2804: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2805: 				     true                       -> 1
 2806: 				  end,
 2807: 				  Client,
 2808: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2809: 				  CPayload)
 2810:                         end),
 2811:     receive
 2812: 	{'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2813: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2814: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2815: 	    {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2816:     after 2000 ->
 2817:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2818:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2819:             {ok, Sender}
 2820:     end.
 2821:     
 2822: craasp_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2823:     ?P("[socket,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]), 
 2824:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2825: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2826: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] payload send failure (as expected)", [N]), 
 2827: 	    exit(normal);
 2828: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2829: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected failure reason:"
 2830: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2831: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload);
 2832: 	ok ->
 2833: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected success - expected failure with ~p",
 2834:                [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2835: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload)
 2836:     end;
 2837: craasp_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2838:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2839: 
 2840: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2841: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2842:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2843:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed)", [EConnReset]),
 2844:     if
 2845:         is_port(Client) ->
 2846:             ?P("   Port Info:     ~p"
 2847:                "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2848:                [try erlang:port_info(Client)
 2849:                 catch
 2850:                     _:_:_ ->
 2851:                         "-"
 2852:                 end,
 2853:                 try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2854:                     {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2855:                     _             -> "-"
 2856:                 catch
 2857:                     _:_:_ ->
 2858:                         "-"
 2859:                 end]);
 2860:         true ->
 2861:             ?P("   Socket Info: ~p", [inet:info(Client)])
 2862:     end,
 2863:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2864:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2865:             ok;
 2866:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2867:             ok;
 2868:         {error, Reason} ->
 2869:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2870:         ok ->
 2871:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2872:     end;
 2873: craasp_verify(win32 = _OS, true = _ISB,
 2874: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2875:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2876:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2877:        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 2878:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2879:        [EConnReset, inet:info(Client),
 2880: 	try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2881:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2882:             _             -> "-"
 2883:         catch
 2884:             _:_:_ ->
 2885:                 "-"
 2886:         end]),
 2887:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2888:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2889:             ok;
 2890:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2891:             ok;
 2892:         {error, Reason} ->
 2893:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2894:         ok ->
 2895:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2896:     end.
 2897: 
 2898: craasp_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2899:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2900:     craasp_cleanup(Sender).
 2901: 
 2902: craasp_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2903:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2904:     receive
 2905:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2906:             ok
 2907:     after 0 ->
 2908:             ok
 2909:     end;
 2910: craasp_cleanup(_) ->
 2911:     ok.
 2912:

 2914: 
 2915: %%
 2916: %% Test {linger {true, 0}} aborts a connection
 2917: %%
 2918: 
 2919: linger_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2920:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2921:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2922:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2923:                             Addr;
 2924:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2925:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2926:                     end
 2927:            end,
 2928:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) end,
 2929:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2930:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2931: 
 2932: do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) ->
 2933:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 2934:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 2935:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty.
 2936:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2937:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lz_pre(Config, Addr),
 2938: 
 2939:     ?P("[ctrl] populate when"
 2940:        "~n   OS:     ~p"
 2941:        "~n   ISB:    ~p"
 2942:        "~n   Client: ~p"
 2943:        "~n   Server: ~p", [OS, ISB, Client, Server]),
 2944:     PayloadSize  = 1024 * 1024,
 2945:     {ok, Sender} = lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 2946: 
 2947:     ?P("[ctrl] set linger: {true, 0}"),
 2948:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  true}]),
 2949:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2950:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 1}}]),
 2951:     ?P("[ctrl] read back the linger option"),
 2952:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2953:     %% {ok, [{linger, {true, 1}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2954:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  false}]),
 2955:     ?P("[ctrl] close client socket"),
 2956:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
 2957:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2958:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 2959: 
 2960:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2961:     lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 2962: 
 2963:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"), % Just in case
 2964:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 2965:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 2966:        true           -> ok
 2967:     end,
 2968: 
 2969:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2970:     ok.
 2971: 
 2972: lz_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2973:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2974:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2975:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 2976:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 2977:                                   {active,          false},
 2978:                                   {recbuf,          4096},
 2979:                                   {show_econnreset, true}]),
 2980:     ?P("listen socket created"),
 2981:     %% inet_backend = inet
 2982:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2983:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 2984:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2985:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 2986:                             {nodelay, true},
 2987:                             {active,  false},
 2988:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 2989:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2990:                      CSock;
 2991:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2992:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2993:              end,
 2994:     ?P("accept"),
 2995:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2996:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2997:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2998:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 2999: 
 3000: lz_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3001:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3002:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3003:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3004:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3005:     {ok, undefined};
 3006: lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3007:     ?P("[socket] send payload"),
 3008:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3009: 				lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3010: 			end),
 3011:     receive
 3012:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3013:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3014:     after 2000 ->
 3015:             {ok, Sender}
 3016:     end.
 3017: 
 3018: lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3019:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3020:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3021:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3022: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"),
 3023: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3024: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3025: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3026: 	    exit(normal);
 3027:        true ->
 3028: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"),
 3029: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3030: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3031: 	    exit(normal)
 3032:     end.
 3033: 
 3034: 
 3035: lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3036:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3037:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3038:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Client, connected),
 3039:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3040:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3041:     ok;
 3042: lz_verify(_Client, Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3043:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3044:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3045:     ok.
 3046: 
 3047: lz_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3048:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(PayloadSize, $.)).
 3049: 
 3050: %% THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR 'SOCKET'
 3051: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS) when is_port(Sock) ->
 3052:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, 1).
 3053: 
 3054: -define(LZ_MAX_SENDS, 3).
 3055: 
 3056: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, _Payload, _OS, N) when (N > ?LZ_MAX_SENDS) ->
 3057:     ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3058:        "~n   Socket:      ~p"
 3059:        "~n   Socket info: ~p", [Sock, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3060:     ct:fail("Queue size verification failed");
 3061: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N) ->
 3062:     ?P("try send payload (~w bytes) ~w (on client socket) when port info:"
 3063:        "~n   ~p", [byte_size(Payload), N, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3064:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Payload),
 3065:     ?P("try verify client socket queue size"),
 3066:     case erlang:port_info(Sock, queue_size) of
 3067: 	{queue_size, QSz} when QSz > 0 ->
 3068:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* (~p) - port info: "
 3069:                "~n   ~p", [QSz, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3070:             ok;
 3071: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 ->
 3072:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* - port info: "
 3073:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3074:             ok;
 3075: 	{queue_size, 0} ->
 3076:             ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3077:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3078:             lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N+1)
 3079:     end.
 3080: 
 3081: 
 3082: linger_zero_sndbuf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3083:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3084:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3085:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3086:                             Addr;
 3087:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3088:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3089:                     end
 3090:            end,
 3091:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) end,
 3092:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3093:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3094: 
 3095: do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) ->
 3096:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 3097:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 3098:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty
 3099:     %% and the linger zero option is set on the listen socket.
 3100:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lzs_pre(Config, Addr),
 3101:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 3102: 
 3103:     PayloadSize = 1024 * 1024,
 3104:     {ok, Sender} = lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 3105: 
 3106:     ?P("verify linger: {true, 0}"),
 3107:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Server, [linger]),
 3108:     ?P("close client socket"),
 3109:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 3110:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 3111: 
 3112:     lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 3113: 
 3114:     ?P("cleanup"), % Just in case
 3115:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 3116:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 3117:        true           -> ok
 3118:     end,
 3119: 
 3120:     ?P("done"),
 3121:     ok.
 3122: 
 3123: lzs_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 3124:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 3125:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 3126:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 3127:     {ok, Listen} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 3128:                                        {active,          false},
 3129:                                        {recbuf,          4096},
 3130:                                        {show_econnreset, true},
 3131:                                        {linger,          {true, 0}}]),
 3132:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
 3133:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 3134:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3135:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 3136:                             {nodelay, true},
 3137:                             {active,  false},
 3138:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3139:             {ok, CSock} ->
 3140:                 CSock;
 3141:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3142:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3143:         end,
 3144:     ?P("accept"),
 3145:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(Listen),
 3146:     %% On *some* platforms, the linger is inherited,
 3147:     %% but not all so do not assume...
 3148:     ?P("check if linger option was inherited"),
 3149:     case inet:getopts(Server, [linger]) of
 3150: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} ->
 3151: 	    ?P("linger option was inherited"),
 3152: 	    ok;
 3153: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, TO}}]} ->
 3154: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: TRUE, ~p", [TO]),
 3155: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3156: 	    ok;
 3157: 	{ok, [{linger, {false, TO}}]} ->
 3158: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: FALSE, ~p", [TO]),
 3159: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3160: 	    ok;
 3161: 	{error, SReason} ->
 3162: 	    ?P("FAILED reading linger option: ~p", [SReason]),
 3163: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3164: 	    ok
 3165:     end,
 3166:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3167:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Listen),
 3168:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3169: 
 3170: lzs_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3171:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3172:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3173:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3174:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3175:     {ok, undefined};
 3176: lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3177:     ?P("[socket] send payload ( = start payload sender)"),
 3178:     Sender = spawn(fun() ->
 3179: 			   lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3180: 		   end),
 3181:     receive
 3182:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3183:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3184:     after 2000 ->
 3185:             {ok, Sender}
 3186:     end.
 3187: 
 3188: lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3189:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3190:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3191:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3192: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"), 
 3193: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3194: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3195: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3196: 	    exit(normal);
 3197:        true ->
 3198: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"), 
 3199: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3200: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3201: 	    exit(normal)
 3202:     end.
 3203:     
 3204: lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3205:     Payload = binary:copy(<<"0123456789ABCDEF">>, 64 * 1024), % 1 MB
 3206:     if (PayloadSize =:= byte_size(Payload)) ->
 3207:             Payload;
 3208:        true ->
 3209:             exit({payload_size, PayloadSize, byte_size(Payload)})
 3210:     end.
 3211: 
 3212: lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3213:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3214:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3215:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Server, connected),
 3216:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3217:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3218:     ok;
 3219: lzs_verify(Client, _Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3220:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3221:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3222:     ok.
 3223:     
 3224: %% Thanks to Luke Gorrie. Tests for a very specific problem with 
 3225: %% corrupt data. The testcase will be killed by the timetrap timeout
 3226: %% if the bug is present.
 3227: http_bad_packet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3228:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3229:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3230:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3231:                             Addr;
 3232:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3233:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3234:                     end
 3235:            end,
 3236:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) end,
 3237:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3238:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3239: 
 3240: do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) ->
 3241:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,        Addr},
 3242:                                  {active,    false},
 3243:                                  binary,
 3244:                                  {reuseaddr, true},
 3245:                                  {packet,    http}]),
 3246:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3247:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3248:                        erlang:yield(),
 3249:                        http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port)
 3250:                end),
 3251:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3252:         {ok,S} ->
 3253:             http_worker(S);
 3254:         Err ->
 3255:             exit({accept,Err})
 3256:     end.
 3257: 
 3258: http_worker(S) ->
 3259:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, 30000) of
 3260: 	{ok,{http_error,Error}} ->
 3261: 	     io:format("Http error: ~s\n", [Error]);
 3262: 	{ok,Data} ->
 3263: 	    io:format("Data: ~p\n", [Data]),
 3264: 	    http_worker(S)
 3265:     end.
 3266: 
 3267: http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port) ->
 3268:     {ok,S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3269:                       [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}, binary]),
 3270:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, "\r\n"),
 3271:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S).
 3272: 
 3273: 
 3274: %% Fill send queue and then start receiving.
 3275: %%
 3276: busy_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3277:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3278:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3279:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3280:                             Addr;
 3281:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3282:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3283:                     end
 3284:            end,
 3285:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_send(Config, Addr) end,
 3286:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3287:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3288: 
 3289: do_busy_send(Config, Addr) ->
 3290:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3291:     Master  = self(),
 3292:     Msg     = <<"the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n">>,
 3293:     ?P("[master] start server"),
 3294:     ServerF =
 3295:         fun() ->
 3296:                 ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3297:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,
 3298:                                          {ip,        Addr},
 3299:                                          {active,    false},
 3300:                                          {reuseaddr, true},
 3301:                                          {packet,    0},
 3302:                                          {recbuf,    4096},
 3303:                                          {sndbuf,    4096}]) of
 3304:                     {ok, L} ->
 3305:                         ?P("[server] listen socket created"),
 3306:                         {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 3307:                         Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3308:                         ?P("[server] await continue"),
 3309:                         receive
 3310:                             {Master, continue} ->
 3311:                                 ?P("[server] received continue"),
 3312:                                 busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg)
 3313:                         end;
 3314:                     {error, Reason} ->
 3315:                         ?P("[server] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [Reason]),
 3316:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 3317:                 end
 3318:         end,
 3319:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3320:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3321:     ListenPort =
 3322:         receive
 3323:             {'EXIT', Server, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 3324:                 ?P("[master] server issued skip: "
 3325:                    "~n      ~p", [SKIP]),
 3326:                 throw(SKIP);
 3327: 
 3328:             {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 3329:                 ?P("[master] server crashed: "
 3330:                    "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 3331:                 exit({server, Reason});
 3332: 
 3333:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3334:                 ?P("listen port: ~p", [LP]),
 3335:                 LP
 3336:         end,
 3337:     ?P("[master] start client"),
 3338:     ClientF = 
 3339:       fun () ->
 3340:               ?P("[client] await (connect) server port"),
 3341:               Port =
 3342:                   receive
 3343:                       {Master, connect, P} ->
 3344:                           P
 3345:                   end,
 3346:               ?P("[client] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3347: 	      case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3348:                             [binary,
 3349:                              {ip,     Addr},
 3350:                              {active, false},
 3351:                              {packet, 0},
 3352:                              {recbuf, 4096},
 3353:                              {sndbuf, 4096}]) of
 3354:                   {ok, Socket} ->
 3355:                       Master ! {self(), connected},
 3356:                       ?P("[client] connected - await recv"),
 3357:                       receive
 3358:                           {Master, recv, N} ->
 3359:                               ?P("[client] received recv:~w", [N]),
 3360:                               busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N)
 3361:                       end;
 3362:                   {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3363:                       ?P("[client] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [CReason]),
 3364:                       ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3365:               end
 3366:       end,
 3367:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3368:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [Client]),
 3369:     Server ! {self(), continue},
 3370:     Client ! {self(), connect, ListenPort},
 3371:     receive
 3372:         {Client, connected} ->
 3373:             ?P("[master] client connected"),
 3374:             ok
 3375:     end,
 3376:     busy_send_loop(Server, Client, 0),
 3377:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 3378:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3379:     ok.
 3380: 
 3381: busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N) ->
 3382:     %% Master
 3383:     %%
 3384:     receive
 3385:         {Server, send} ->
 3386:             busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N+1)
 3387: 
 3388:     after 2000 ->
 3389:             ?P("[master] send timeout: server send queue full (N = ~w+1)", [N]),
 3390:             %% Send queue full, sender blocked 
 3391:             %% -> stop sender and release client
 3392:             Server ! {self(), close},
 3393:             Client ! {self(), recv, N+1},
 3394:             ?P("[master] await server 'send'..."),
 3395:             receive
 3396:                 {Server, send} ->
 3397:                     busy_send_2(Server, Client, N+1)
 3398:             after 10000 ->
 3399:                     %% If this happens, see busy_send_srv
 3400:                     ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server send timeout"),
 3401:                     ct:fail({timeout,{server,not_send,flush([])}})
 3402:             end
 3403:     end.
 3404: 
 3405: busy_send_2(Server, Client, _N) ->
 3406:     %% Master
 3407:     %%
 3408:     ?P("[master] await (server) closed"),
 3409:     receive
 3410:         {Server, [closed]} ->
 3411:             ?P("[master] received expected (server) closed - "
 3412:                "await client closed"),
 3413:             receive
 3414:                 {Client, [0,{error,closed}]} ->
 3415:                     ?P("[master] received expected (client) closed"),
 3416:                     ok
 3417:             end
 3418:     after 10000 ->
 3419:             ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server closed timeout"),
 3420:             ct:fail({timeout, {server, not_closed, flush([])}})
 3421:     end.
 3422: 
 3423: busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg) ->
 3424:     %% Server
 3425:     %% Sometimes this accept does not return, do not really know why
 3426:     %% but it causes the timeout error in busy_send_loop to be
 3427:     %% triggered. Only happens on OS X Leopard?!?
 3428:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3429:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3430:         {ok, Socket} ->
 3431:             ?P("[server] accepted"),
 3432:             busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg);
 3433:         {error, Reason} ->
 3434:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: server accept failure: ~p", [Reason]),
 3435:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason))
 3436:     end.
 3437: 
 3438: busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg) ->
 3439:     %% Server
 3440:     %%
 3441:     receive
 3442: 	{Master, close} ->
 3443:             ?P("[server] received close"),
 3444: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 3445: 	    Master ! {self(),flush([closed])}
 3446:     after 0 ->
 3447: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 3448: 	    Master ! {self(), send},
 3449: 	    busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg)
 3450:     end.
 3451: 
 3452: busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N) ->
 3453:     %% Client
 3454:     %%
 3455:     Size = byte_size(Msg),
 3456:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, Size) of
 3457: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3458: 	    busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N-1);
 3459: 	Other ->
 3460:             ?P("[client] recv response: "
 3461:                "~n      ~p", [Other]),
 3462: 	    Master ! {self(), flush([Other,N])}
 3463:     end.
 3464: 
 3465: %%%
 3466: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3467: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error.
 3468: %%% (Passive mode.)
 3469: %%%
 3470: 
 3471: busy_disconnect_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3472:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3473:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3474:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3475:                             Addr;
 3476:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3477:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3478:                     end
 3479:            end,
 3480:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) end,
 3481:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3482:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3483: 
 3484: do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 3485:     ?P("[passive] begin"),
 3486:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3487:     [do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3488:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3489:     ?P("[passive] done"),
 3490:     ok.
 3491: 
 3492: do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3493:     ?P("[passive,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3494:     {_Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,false}]),
 3495:     ?P("[passive,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3496:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3497:     busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, MuchoData, OSName).
 3498: 
 3499: busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS) ->
 3500:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3501: 	ok ->
 3502:             busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS);
 3503: 	{error, closed} ->
 3504:             ok;
 3505: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3506: 	    ?P("send failed with ~w", [Reason]),
 3507:             ok
 3508:     end.
 3509: 
 3510: %%%
 3511: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3512: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error and
 3513: %%% a {tcp_closed,Socket} message. (Active mode.)
 3514: %%%
 3515: busy_disconnect_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3516:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3517:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3518:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3519:                             Addr;
 3520:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3521:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3522:                     end
 3523:            end,
 3524:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) end,
 3525:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3526:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3527: 
 3528: do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) ->
 3529:     ?P("[active] begin"),
 3530:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3531:     [do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3532:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3533:     ?P("[active] done"),
 3534:     ok.
 3535: 
 3536: do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3537:     ?P("[active,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3538:     {Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,true}]),
 3539:     ?P("[active,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3540:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, MuchoData).
 3541: 
 3542: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data) ->
 3543:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3544:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, 1, OSName).
 3545: 
 3546: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter, OS) ->
 3547:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3548: 	ok ->
 3549:             busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter+1, OS);
 3550: 	{error, closed} ->
 3551:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with closed - await tcp-closed",
 3552: 	       [Iter]),
 3553:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3554: 
 3555: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3556:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with ~w - await tcp-closed",
 3557: 	       [Iter, Reason]),
 3558:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3559: 
 3560:         {error, einval = Reason} ->
 3561:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3562:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3563:             ?SKIPT(send_failed_str(Reason));
 3564: 
 3565:         {error, Reason} ->
 3566:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3567:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3568:             ct:fail({unexpected_send_result, Reason, Iter})
 3569:     end.
 3570: 
 3571: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S) ->
 3572:     busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, false, false).
 3573: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, Stopped) ->
 3574:     receive
 3575:         {tcp_closed, S} when (Stopped =:= true) ->
 3576:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed - done"),
 3577:             ok;
 3578: 
 3579:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 3580:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed"),
 3581:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, true, Stopped);
 3582: 
 3583:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} when (Closed =:= true) ->
 3584:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit - done"),
 3585:             ok;
 3586: 
 3587:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 3588:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit"),
 3589:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, true);
 3590: 
 3591:         Other ->
 3592:             ?P("[active-sender] received UNEXPECTED message:"
 3593:                "~n   Expected tcp-close of ~p"
 3594:                "~n   Server:               ~p"
 3595:                "~n   Unexpected message:   ~p", [S, Server, Other]),
 3596:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other, S, flush([])})
 3597:     end.
 3598:     
 3599: 
 3600: busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, ConnectOpts) ->
 3601:     Sender = self(),
 3602:     ?P("[prep-server] create server"),
 3603:     Server = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3604:                                 busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender)
 3605:                         end),
 3606:     ?P("[prep-server] await port (from server)"),
 3607:     receive {port, Server, Port} -> ok end,
 3608:     ?P("[prep-server] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3609:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | ConnectOpts]) of
 3610:         {ok, S} ->
 3611:             ?P("[prep-server] connected - order server start sending"),
 3612:             Server ! {Sender, sending},
 3613:             ?P("[prep-server] done"),
 3614:             {Server, S};
 3615:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3616:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3617:     end.
 3618: 
 3619: busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender) ->
 3620:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3621:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3622:                       [binary,
 3623:                        {ip,        Addr},
 3624:                        {active,    false},
 3625:                        {reuseaddr, true},
 3626:                        {packet,    0}]),
 3627:     ?P("[server] created - get port number"),
 3628:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3629:     ?P("[server] send port ~w (to sender)", [Port]),
 3630:     Sender ! {port,self(),Port},
 3631:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3632:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3633:     ?P("[server] connection accepted"),
 3634:     receive
 3635: 	{Sender, sending} ->
 3636:             ?P("[server] received sending (from sender)"),
 3637: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3638:     end.
 3639: 
 3640: %% Close the socket as soon as the Sender process can't send because of
 3641: %% a busy port.
 3642: busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S) ->
 3643:     case process_info(Sender, status) of
 3644: 	{status, waiting = Status} ->
 3645: 	    %% We KNOW that the sender will be in state 'waiting' only
 3646: 	    %% if the port has become busy. (Fallback solution if the
 3647: 	    %% implementation changes: Watch Sender's reduction count;
 3648: 	    %% when it stops changing, wait 2 seconds and then close.)
 3649: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p => close socket", [Status]),
 3650: 	    gen_tcp:close(S);
 3651: 	{status, Status} ->
 3652: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Status]),
 3653: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3654: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S);
 3655: 	Other ->
 3656: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Other]),
 3657: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3658: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3659:     end.
 3660: 
 3661: 
 3662: %%%
 3663: %%% Fill send queue
 3664: %%%
 3665: fill_sendq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3666:     Cond = fun() ->
 3667: 		   is_windows() andalso ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 3668: 		       skip("Unstable for 'socket on Windows'"),
 3669: 		   ok
 3670: 	   end,
 3671:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3672:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3673:                             Addr;
 3674:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3675:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3676:                     end
 3677:            end,
 3678:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) end,
 3679:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3680:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3681: 
 3682: do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) ->
 3683:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3684:     Master  = self(),
 3685:     ServerF =
 3686:         fun () ->
 3687:                 ?P("[server] try listen"),
 3688:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr},
 3689:                                          {active,false},binary,
 3690:                                          {reuseaddr,true},{packet,0}]) of
 3691:                     {ok, L} ->
 3692:                         ?P("[server] try port"),
 3693:                         case inet:port(L) of
 3694:                             {ok, Port} ->
 3695:                                 Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3696:                                 fill_sendq_srv(L, Master);
 3697:                             {error, PReason} ->
 3698:                                 ?SKIPE(port_failed_str(PReason))
 3699:                         end;
 3700:                     {error, LReason} ->
 3701:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 3702:                 end
 3703:         end,
 3704:     Server  = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3705:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3706:     ClientF =
 3707:         fun () ->
 3708:                 ?P("[client] await server port"),
 3709:                 ServerPort =
 3710:                     receive
 3711:                         {Master, server_port, SP} ->
 3712:                             ?P("[client] server port: ~w", [SP]),
 3713:                             SP
 3714:                     end,
 3715:                 %% Just close on order
 3716:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 3717:                 case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, ServerPort,
 3718:                               [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{packet,0}]) of
 3719:                     {ok, S} ->
 3720:                         ?P("[client] connected"),
 3721:                         Master ! {self(), connected},
 3722:                         receive
 3723:                             {Master, close} ->
 3724:                                 ?P("[client] received close"),
 3725:                                 ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 3726:                         end;
 3727:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3728:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3729:                 end
 3730:         end,
 3731:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3732:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [client]),
 3733:     ListenPort =
 3734:         receive
 3735:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3736:                 ?P("[master] listen port: ~w", [LP]),
 3737:                 LP
 3738:         end,
 3739:     Client ! {self(), server_port, ListenPort},
 3740:     ?P("[master] await client connected"),
 3741:     receive {Client, connected} -> ok end,
 3742:     ?P("[master] await reader"),
 3743:     Res = receive
 3744:               {Server, reader, Reader} ->
 3745:                   ?P("[master] reader: ~p", [Reader]),
 3746:                   fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3747:           end,
 3748:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),    
 3749:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3750:     Res.
 3751: 
 3752: fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader) ->
 3753:     %% Master
 3754:     %%
 3755:     receive
 3756:         {Server, send} ->
 3757: 	    fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3758:     after 2000 ->
 3759: 	    %% Send queue full, sender blocked -> close client.
 3760: 	    ?P("[master] send timeout, closing client"),
 3761: 	    Client ! {self(), close},
 3762: 	    receive
 3763:                 {Server, [{error,closed}] = SErrors} ->
 3764:                     ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3765:                     receive
 3766:                         {Reader, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3767:                             ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3768:                             ok;
 3769:                         {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3770:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3771:                     after 3000 ->
 3772:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,reader}})
 3773:                     end;
 3774: 
 3775:                 {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3776:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED SERVER ERROR(S): "
 3777:                        "~n   ~p"
 3778:                        "~n   ~p", [SErrors, flush([])]),
 3779:                     ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, []}]);
 3780: 
 3781:                 {Reader, [{error,closed}] = RErrors} ->
 3782:                     ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3783:                     receive
 3784:                         {Server, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3785:                             ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3786:                             ok;
 3787:                         {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3788:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3789:                     after 3000 ->
 3790:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,server}})
 3791:                     end;
 3792: 
 3793:                 {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3794:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED READER ERROR(S): "
 3795:                        "~n   ~p"
 3796:                        "~n   ~p", [RErrors, flush([])]),
 3797:                     ct:fail([{server, []}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3798: 
 3799:             after 3000 ->
 3800:                     Msgs = flush([]),
 3801:                     ct:fail({timeout,{closed,[server,reader]}, Msgs})
 3802:             end
 3803:     end.
 3804: 
 3805: fill_sendq_srv(L, Master) ->
 3806:     %% Server
 3807:     %%
 3808:     ?P("[server] await accept"),
 3809:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3810: 	{ok, S} ->
 3811:             ?P("[server] accepted ~p", [S]),
 3812: 	    Master ! {self(), reader,
 3813: 		      spawn_link(fun () -> fill_sendq_read(S, Master) end)},
 3814: 	    Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n",
 3815: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, [Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg]);
 3816: 	E ->
 3817:             Error = flush([E]),
 3818: 	    ?P("[server] accept error: ~p", [E]),
 3819: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3820:     end.
 3821: 
 3822: fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg) ->
 3823:     %% Server
 3824:     %%
 3825:     %% ?P("[server,writer] sending..."),
 3826:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Msg) of
 3827: 	ok ->
 3828:             Master ! {self(), send},
 3829: 	    %% ?P("[server,writer] ok."),
 3830: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg);
 3831: 	{error, _} = E ->
 3832: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3833: 	    ?P("[server,writer] send error: ~p", [Error]),
 3834: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3835:     end.
 3836: 
 3837: fill_sendq_read(S, Master) ->
 3838:     %% Reader
 3839:     %%
 3840:     ?P("[server,reader] read infinity..."),
 3841:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, infinity) of
 3842: 	{ok, Data} ->
 3843: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv: ~p", [Data]),
 3844: 	    fill_sendq_read(S, Master);
 3845: 	E ->
 3846: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3847: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv error: ~p", [Error]),
 3848: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3849:     end.
 3850: 
 3851: 
 3852: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3853: %%% a closed socket.
 3854: %%%
 3855: partial_recv_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3856:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3857:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3858:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3859:                             Addr;
 3860:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3861:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3862:                     end
 3863:            end,
 3864:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) end,
 3865:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3866:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3867: 
 3868: do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) ->
 3869:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3870:     Len = length(Msg),
 3871:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3872:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3873:     Sock =
 3874:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3875:             {ok, S} ->
 3876:                 S;
 3877:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3878:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3879:     end,
 3880:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3881:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Msg),
 3882:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 3883:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3884:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3885: 	{error, closed} ->
 3886: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3887: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3888: 	    ok;
 3889: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3890: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3891: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3892: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3893: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3894: 	    error;
 3895: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3896: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with expected message): "
 3897: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3898: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3899: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3900: 	    error;
 3901: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3902: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with unexpected message): "
 3903: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3904: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3905: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3906: 	    error
 3907:     end.
 3908: 
 3909: 
 3910: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3911: %%% a closed socket, this time waiting in the recv before closing.
 3912: %%%
 3913: partial_recv_and_close_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3914:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3915:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3916:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3917:                             Addr;
 3918:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3919:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3920:                     end
 3921:            end,
 3922:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) end,
 3923:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3924:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3925: 
 3926: do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) ->
 3927:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3928:     Len = length(Msg),
 3929:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3930:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3931:     Server = self(),
 3932:     Client =
 3933: 	spawn_link(
 3934: 	  fun () ->
 3935: 		  receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3936: 		  case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3937:                       {ok, S} ->
 3938:                           ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Msg),
 3939:                           receive {Server,close} -> ok end,
 3940:                           receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3941:                           ok = gen_tcp:close(S);
 3942:                       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3943:                           ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3944:                   end
 3945: 	  end),
 3946:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3947:     Client ! {Server, close},
 3948:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1),
 3949:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3950:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3951: 	{error, closed} ->
 3952: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3953: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3954: 	    ok;
 3955: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3956: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3957: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3958: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3959: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3960: 	    error;
 3961: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3962: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with 'expected' message): "
 3963: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3964: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3965: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3966: 	    error;
 3967: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3968: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with *unexpected* message): "
 3969: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3970: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3971: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3972: 	    error
 3973:     end.

 3975: %%% Here we tests that gen_tcp:recv/2 will return {error,closed} following
 3976: %%% a send operation of a huge amount data when the other end closed the socket.
 3977: %%%
 3978: partial_recv_and_close_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3979:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3980:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3981:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3982:                             Addr;
 3983:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3984:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3985:                     end
 3986:            end,
 3987:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) end,
 3988:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3989:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3990: 
 3991: do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) ->
 3992:     [do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) || _ <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
 3993:     ok.
 3994: 
 3995: do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) ->
 3996:     Parent = self(),
 3997:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3998: 		       {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3999:                                         [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4000: 		       {ok, {_,Port}} = inet:sockname(L),
 4001: 		       Parent ! {port,Port},
 4002: 		       {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 4003: 		       gen_tcp:recv(S, 1),
 4004: 		       gen_tcp:close(S)
 4005: 	       end),
 4006:     receive
 4007: 	{port,Port} -> ok
 4008:     end,
 4009:     Much = ones(8*64*1024),
 4010:     S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 4011:             {ok, Sock} ->
 4012:                 Sock;
 4013:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4014:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4015:     end,
 4016: 
 4017:     %% Send a lot of data (most of it will be queued).
 4018:     %% The receiver will read one byte and close the connection.
 4019:     %% The write operation will fail.
 4020:     gen_tcp:send(S, Much),
 4021: 
 4022:     %% We should always get {error,closed} here.
 4023:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0).
 4024:

 4026: test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr) ->
 4027:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4028:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> create listen socket"),
 4029:     {ok,L1} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4030:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4031:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]),
 4032:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts tos (= ~p)", [Tos]),
 4033:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{tos,Tos}]),
 4034:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4035:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4036:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4037:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]), % Dont destroy each other
 4038:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4039:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4040:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts reuseaddr (= true)"),
 4041:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{reuseaddr,true}]), % Dont let others destroy
 4042:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4043:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4044:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> close listen socket"),
 4045:     gen_tcp:close(L1),
 4046:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> done"),
 4047:     ok.

 4049: test_prio_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4050:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> create listen socket"),
 4051:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4052:                                      {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4}]),
 4053:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4054:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4055:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4056:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4057:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4058:                                                {packet,0},
 4059:                                                {active,false},
 4060:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4061:                                                {priority,4}]) of
 4062:                 {ok, S2} -> 
 4063:                     S2;
 4064:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4065:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4066:             end,
 4067:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connected => accept connection"),
 4068:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4069:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> accepted => getopts prio for listen socket"),
 4070:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority]),
 4071:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for connected socket"),
 4072:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority]),
 4073:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for accepted socket"),
 4074:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority]),
 4075:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close listen socket"),
 4076:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4077:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close connected socket"),
 4078:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4079:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close accepted socket"),
 4080:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4081:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> done"),
 4082:     ok.
