 4162: test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr) ->
 4163:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4164:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4165:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4166:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> create prio server"),
 4167:     spawn(?MODULE, priority_server, [Config, Addr, {self(),Ref}]),
 4168:     Port = receive
 4169:                {Ref,P} -> P
 4170:            after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4171:            end,
 4172:     receive
 4173:     after 3000 -> ok
 4174:     end,
 4175:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4176:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4177: 					      {ip, Addr},
 4178: 					      {packet,0},
 4179:                                               {active,false},
 4180:                                               {reuseaddr,true},
 4181:                                               {priority,4},
 4182:                                               {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4183:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4184:                     S2;
 4185:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4186:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4187:             end,
 4188:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> "
 4189:        "connected => await prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4190:     receive
 4191:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4192:             ok;
 4193:         {Ref,Error} ->
 4194:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error})
 4195:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4196:     end,
 4197:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> await prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4198:     receive
 4199:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4200:             ok;
 4201:         {Ref,Error2} ->
 4202:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error2})
 4203:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4204:     end,
 4205: 
 4206:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4207:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4208:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> close connected socket"),
 4209:     catch gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4210:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> done"),
 4211:     ok.
 4212: 
 4213: priority_server(Config, Addr, {Parent,Ref}) ->
 4214:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4215:     {ok,Sock}=?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4216:                                 {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4217:                                 {tos,Tos1}]),
 4218:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4219:     Parent ! {Ref,Port},
 4220:     {ok,Sock3}=gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4221:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos])},
 4222:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos])},
 4223:     ok.
 4224: 
 4225: test_prio_fail(Config, Addr) ->
 4226:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> create listen socket"),
 4227:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4228:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> try set (and fail) opts prio (= 1000)"),
 4229:     {error,_} = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1000}]),
 4230:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close listen socket"),
 4231:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 4232:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4233:     ok.
 4234: 
 4235: test_prio_udp(Addr) ->
 4236:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4237:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> create UDP socket (open)"),
 4238:     {ok,S} = gen_udp:open(0,[{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{tos, Tos},
 4239:                              {priority,3}]),
 4240:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> getopts prio and tos"),
 4241:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(S,[priority,tos]),
 4242:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close socket"),
 4243:     gen_udp:close(S),
 4244:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4245:     ok.
 4246: 
 4247: %% Tests the so_priority and ip_tos options on sockets when applicable.
 4248: so_priority(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4249:     Cond = fun() ->
 4250: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 4251: 		       true ->
 4252: 		           is_socket_supported(),
 4253:                            has_support_sock_priority();
 4254: 		       false ->
 4255: 			   ok
 4256: 		   end
 4257:     	 end,
 4258:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4259:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4260:                             Addr;
 4261:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4262:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4263:                     end
 4264:            end,
 4265:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_so_priority(Config, Addr) end,
 4266:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4267:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4268: 
 4269: do_so_priority(Config, Addr) ->
 4270:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 4271:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4272:     ?P("set opts on listen socket: prio to 1"),
 4273:     ok = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1}]),
 4274:     ?P("verify prio"),
 4275:     case inet:getopts(L,[priority]) of
 4276: 	{ok,[{priority,1}]} ->
 4277:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 4278: 	    gen_tcp:close(L),
 4279: 	    test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr),
 4280: 	    test_prio_accept(Config, Addr),
 4281: 	    test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr),
 4282: 	    test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr),
 4283: 	    test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr),
 4284: 	    test_prio_fail(Config, Addr),
 4285: 	    test_prio_udp(Addr),
 4286:             ?P("done"),
 4287: 	    ok;
 4288: 	_X ->
 4289: 	    case os:type() of
 4290: 		{unix,linux} ->
 4291: 		    case os:version() of
 4292: 			{X,Y,_} when (X > 2) or ((X =:= 2) and (Y >= 4)) ->
 4293:                             ?P("so prio should work on this version: "
 4294:                                "~n      ~p", [_X]),
 4295: 			    ct:fail({error,
 4296: 					   "so_priority should work on this "
 4297: 					   "OS, but does not"});
 4298: 			_ ->
 4299: 			    {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4300: 		    end;
 4301: 		_ ->
 4302: 		   {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4303: 	    end
 4304:     end.
 4305: 
 4306: 
 4307: 
 4308: %% IP_RECVTOS and IP_RECVTCLASS for IP_PKTOPTIONS
 4309: %% does not seem to be implemented in Linux until kernel 3.1
 4310: %%
 4311: %% It seems pktoptions does not return valid values
 4312: %% for IPv4 connect sockets.  On the accept socket
 4313: %% we get valid values, but on the connect socket we get
 4314: %% the default values for TOS and TTL.
 4315: %%
 4316: %% Therefore the argument CheckConnect that enables
 4317: %% checking the returned values for the connect socket.
 4318: %% It is only used for recvtclass that is an IPv6 option
 4319: %% and there we get valid values from both socket ends.
 4320: 
 4321: has_support_ip_pktoptions() ->
 4322:     has_support_ip_option(pktoptions).
 4323: 
 4324: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
 4325:     has_support_ip_option(recvtos).
 4326: 
 4327: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
 4328:     has_support_ip_option(recvttl).
 4329: 
 4330: has_support_ipv6_pktoptions() ->
 4331:     has_support_ipv6_option(pktoptions).
 4332: 
 4333: has_support_ipv6_tclass() ->
 4334:     has_support_ipv6_option(tclass).
 4335: 
 4336: has_support_ip_option(Opt) ->
 4337:     has_support_option(ip, Opt).
 4338: 
 4339: has_support_ipv6_option(Opt) ->
 4340:     has_support_option(ipv6, Opt).
 4341: 
 4342: has_support_option(Level, Option) ->
 4343:     try socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option)
 4344:     catch
 4345: 	_:_:_ -> false % Any platform that does not support socket!
 4346:     end.
 4347: 
 4348: has_os_support_recvtos() ->
 4349:     has_os_support_recvtos(os:type(), os:version()).
 4350: 
 4351: has_os_support_recvtos({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4352:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4353: has_os_support_recvtos(_, _) ->
 4354:     true.
 4355: 
 4356: has_os_support_recvttl() ->
 4357:     has_os_support_recvttl(os:type(), os:version()).
 4358: 
 4359: has_os_support_recvttl({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4360:     not semver_lt(Version, {2,7,0});
 4361: has_os_support_recvttl(_, _) ->
 4362:     %% We should not even get here, but just in case...
 4363:     false.
 4364: 
 4365: has_os_support_recvtclass() ->
 4366:     has_os_support_recvtclass(os:type(), os:version()).
 4367: 
 4368: has_os_support_recvtclass({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4369:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4370: has_os_support_recvtclass(_, _) ->
 4371:     true.
 4372: 
 4373: semver_lt({X1,Y1,Z1} = V1, {X2,Y2,Z2} = V2) ->
 4374:     ?P("semver_lt -> OS version check:"
 4375:        "~n   (Actual)  Version 1: ~p"
 4376:        "~n   (Request) Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4377:     if
 4378:         X1 > X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 > X2: ~p > ~p", [X1, X2]), false;
 4379:         X1 < X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 < X2: ~p < ~p", [X1, X2]), true;
 4380:         Y1 > Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 > Y2: ~p > ~p", [Y1, Y2]), false;
 4381:         Y1 < Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 < Y2: ~p < ~p", [Y1, Y2]), true;
 4382:         Z1 > Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 > Z2: ~p > ~p", [Z1, Z2]), false;
 4383:         Z1 < Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 < Z2: ~p < ~p", [Z1, Z2]), true;
 4384:         true    -> ?P("semver_lt -> default"), false
 4385:     end;
 4386: semver_lt(V1, {_,_,_} = V2) ->
 4387:     ?P("semver_lt -> fallback OS version check when: "
 4388:        "~n   Version 1: ~p"
 4389:        "~n   Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4390:     false.
 4391: 
 4392: recvtos(Config) ->
 4393:     test_pktoptions(
 4394:       Config,
 4395:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96}],
 4396:       fun() ->
 4397:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4398:                   has_os_support_recvtos() 
 4399:      end,
 4400:       "recvtos",
 4401:       false).
 4402: 
 4403: recvtosttl(Config) ->
 4404:     test_pktoptions(
 4405:       Config,
 4406:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96},{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4407:       fun() ->
 4408:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4409: 		  has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4410:                   has_os_support_recvtos() andalso
 4411:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4412:       end,
 4413:       "recvtos and/or recvttl",
 4414:       false).
 4415: 
 4416: recvttl(Config) ->
 4417:     test_pktoptions(
 4418:       Config,
 4419:       inet, [{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4420:       fun() ->
 4421:               has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4422:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4423:       end,
 4424:       "recvttl",
 4425:       false).
 4426: 
 4427: recvtclass(Config) ->
 4428:     {ok,IFs} = inet:getifaddrs(),
 4429:     case
 4430:         [Name ||
 4431:             {Name,Opts} <- IFs,
 4432:             lists:member({addr,{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}, Opts)]
 4433:     of
 4434:         [_] ->
 4435:             test_pktoptions(
 4436:               Config,
 4437:               inet6, [{recvtclass,tclass,224}],
 4438:               fun() ->
 4439:                       has_support_ipv6_tclass() andalso
 4440:                           has_os_support_recvtclass()
 4441:               end,
 4442:               "tclass",
 4443:               true);
 4444:         [] ->
 4445:             {skip,{ipv6_not_supported,IFs}}
 4446:     end.
 4447: 
 4448: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, OptCond, OptStr, CheckConnect) ->
 4449:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4450:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4451:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4452:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4453:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4454:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4455:     PktOptsCond = fun(inet)  -> has_support_ip_pktoptions();
 4456: 		     (inet6) -> has_support_ipv6_pktoptions()
 4457: 		  end,
 4458:     try PktOptsCond(Family) of
 4459: 	true ->
 4460: 	    ?P("pktoptions supported for family ~w", [Family]),
 4461: 	    case OptCond() of
 4462: 		true ->
 4463: 		    ?P("options supported: "
 4464: 		       "~n   ~p", [Spec]),
 4465: 		    test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect);
 4466: 		false ->
 4467: 		    {skip, ?F("Option(s) ~s not supported", [OptStr])}
 4468: 	    end;
 4469:         false ->
 4470:             {skip,
 4471:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4472:     catch
 4473:         _:_:_ ->
 4474:             {skip,
 4475:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4476:     end.
 4477: %%
 4478: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect) ->
 4479:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4480:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4481:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4482:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4483:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4484:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4485:     Timeout = 5000,
 4486:     RecvOpts = [RecvOpt || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4487:     TrueRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,true} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4488:     FalseRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,false} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4489:     Opts = [Opt || {_,Opt,_} <- Spec],
 4490:     OptsVals = [{Opt,Val} || {_,Opt,Val} <- Spec],
 4491:     Address =
 4492:         case Family of
 4493:             inet ->
 4494:                 {127,0,0,1};
 4495:             inet6 ->
 4496:                 {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
 4497:         end,
 4498:     %%
 4499:     %% Set RecvOpts on listen socket
 4500:     ?P("try create listen socket with: ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4501:     {ok, L} =
 4502:         ?LISTEN(Config, 
 4503:                 0,
 4504:                 [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4505:                  |TrueRecvOpts]),
 4506:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 4507:     ?P("get (recv) options for listen socket: "
 4508:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4509:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4510:     ?P("get options for listen socket: "
 4511:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4512:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4513: 
 4514:     %%
 4515:     %% Set RecvOpts and Option values on connect socket
 4516:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4517:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals]),
 4518:     {ok, S2} =
 4519:         ?CONNECT(Config,
 4520:                  Address, P,
 4521:                  [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4522:                   |TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals],
 4523:                  Timeout),
 4524:     ?P("get (recv) options for connect socket: "
 4525:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4526:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S2, RecvOpts),
 4527:     ?P("get options for connect socket: "
 4528:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4529:     {ok, OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S2, Opts),
 4530: 
 4531:     %%
 4532:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4533:     ?P("try create accept socket"),
 4534:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4535:     ?P("get (recv) options for accept socket: "
 4536:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4537:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S1, RecvOpts),
 4538: 
 4539:     ?P("get options for accept socket: "
 4540:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4541:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S1, Opts),
 4542:     ?P("accept socket option values: "
 4543:        "~n   ~p", [OptsValsDefault]),
 4544: 
 4545: %%%    %%
 4546: %%%    %% Handshake
 4547: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S1, <<"hello">>),
 4548: %%%    {ok,<<"hello">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S2, 5, Timeout),
 4549: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S2, <<"hi">>),
 4550: %%%    {ok,<<"hi">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 2, Timeout),
 4551: 
 4552:     %%
 4553:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4554:     VerifyRemOpts =
 4555:         fun(S, Role) ->
 4556:                 case inet:getopts(S, [pktoptions]) of
 4557:                     {ok, []} ->
 4558:                         ?SKIPT("pktoptions not supported");
 4559:                     {ok, [{pktoptions, PktOpts1}]} ->
 4560:                         ?P("PktOptions (~w): "
 4561:                            "~n      ~p", [Role, PktOpts1]),
 4562:                         PktOpts1;
 4563:                     {ok, UnexpOK1} ->
 4564:                         ?P("Unexpected OK (~w): "
 4565:                            "~n   ~p"
 4566:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpOK1]),
 4567:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_ok,
 4568:                               Role,
 4569:                               Spec,
 4570:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4571:                               OptsVals,
 4572:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4573:                               UnexpOK1});
 4574:                     {error, UnexpERR1} ->
 4575:                         ?P("Unexpected ERROR (~w): "
 4576:                            "~n   ~p"
 4577:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpERR1]),
 4578:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_failure,
 4579:                               Role,
 4580:                               Spec,
 4581:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4582:                               OptsVals,
 4583:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4584:                               UnexpERR1})
 4585:                 end
 4586:         end,
 4587:     ?P("verify dest (accept)"),
 4588:     OptsVals1 = VerifyRemOpts(S1, dest),
 4589:     ?P("verify orig (connect)"),
 4590:     OptsVals2 = VerifyRemOpts(S2, orig),
 4591:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals1}]} = inet:getopts(S1, [pktoptions]),
 4592:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals2}]} = inet:getopts(S2, [pktoptions]),
 4593:     (Result1 = sets_eq(OptsVals1, OptsVals))
 4594:         orelse ?P("Accept differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals1,OptsVals]),
 4595:     (Result2 = sets_eq(OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault))
 4596:         orelse ?P("Connect differs: ~p neq ~p",
 4597:                   [OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault]),
 4598:     %%
 4599:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4600:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
 4601:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4602:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 4603:     %%
 4604:     %%
 4605:     %% Clear RecvOpts on listen socket and set Option values
 4606:     ?P("clear (recv) options on listen socket"),
 4607:     ok = inet:setopts(L, FalseRecvOpts ++ OptsVals),
 4608:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4609:     ?P("set  options on listen socket"),
 4610:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4611: 
 4612:     %%
 4613:     %% Set RecvOpts on connecting socket
 4614:     %%
 4615:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4616:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4617:     {ok,S4} =
 4618:         ?CONNECT(Config, 
 4619:           Address, P,
 4620:           [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4621:           |TrueRecvOpts],
 4622:           Timeout),
 4623:     ?P("get (recv) options on connect socket"),
 4624:     {ok,TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S4, RecvOpts),
 4625:     ?P("get options on connect socket"),
 4626:     {ok,OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S4, Opts),
 4627: 
 4628:     %%
 4629:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4630:     ?P("create accept socket"),
 4631:     {ok,S3} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4632:     ?P("get (recv) options on accept socket"),
 4633:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S3, RecvOpts),
 4634:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S3, Opts),
 4635:     %%
 4636:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4637:     ?P("verify pktoptions on accept socket"),
 4638:     {ok,[{pktoptions,[]}]} = inet:getopts(S3, [pktoptions]),
 4639:     ?P("verify pktoptions on connect socket"),
 4640:     {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals4}]} = inet:getopts(S4, [pktoptions]),
 4641:     ?P("verify options set"),
 4642:     (Result3 = sets_eq(OptsVals4, OptsVals))
 4643:         orelse ?P("Accept2 differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals4, OptsVals]),
 4644:     %%
 4645:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4646:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S4),
 4647:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4648:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
 4649:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 4650:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 4651:     ?P("verify final result"
 4652:        "~n   Result1:       ~p"
 4653:        "~n   Check Connect: ~p"
 4654:        "~n   Result2:       ~p"
 4655:        "~n   Result3:       ~p",
 4656:       [Result1, CheckConnect, Result2, Result3]),
 4657:     (Result1 and ((not CheckConnect) or (Result2 and Result3)))
 4658:         orelse
 4659:         exit({failed,
 4660:               [{OptsVals1,OptsVals4,OptsVals},
 4661:                {OptsVals2,OptsValsDefault}]}),
 4662:     ?P("done"),
 4663:     ok.
 4664: 
 4665: sets_eq(L1, L2) ->
 4666:     lists:sort(L1) == lists:sort(L2).
 4667: 
 4668: 
 4669: 
 4670: %% Accept test utilities (suites are below)
 4671: 
 4672: millis() ->
 4673:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 4674: 	
 4675: collect_accepts(0, _) -> [];
 4676: collect_accepts(N, Tmo) ->
 4677:     A = millis(),
 4678:     receive
 4679: 	{accepted, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4680:             ?P("~p Failed accept: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4681:             ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 4682: 
 4683:         {accepted, P, Msg} ->
 4684:             ?P("received 'accepted' from ~p: "
 4685:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4686:             NextN = if N =:= infinity -> N; true -> N - 1 end,
 4687: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_accepts(NextN, Tmo - (millis()-A))
 4688: 
 4689:     after Tmo ->
 4690:             ?P("accept timeout (~w)", [Tmo]),
 4691: 	    []
 4692:     end.
 4693: 
 4694: -define(EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern,N,Timeout),
 4695: 	(fun() ->
 4696:                  case collect_accepts((N), (Timeout)) of
 4697: 		     Pattern ->
 4698: 			 ok;
 4699: 		     Other__ ->
 4700: 			 {error, {unexpected, {Other__, messages()}}}
 4701: 		 end
 4702: 	 end)()).
 4703: 	
 4704: collect_connects(Tmo) ->
 4705:     A = millis(),
 4706:     receive
 4707: 	{connected, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4708:             ?P("~p Failed connect: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4709:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 4710: 
 4711: 	{connected,P,Msg} ->
 4712:             ?P("received connected from ~p: "
 4713:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4714: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_connects(Tmo-(millis() - A))
 4715: 
 4716:     after Tmo ->
 4717: 	    []
 4718:     end.
 4719:    
 4720: -define(EXPECT_CONNECTS(Pattern,Timeout),
 4721: 	(fun() ->
 4722: 		 case collect_connects(Timeout) of
 4723: 		     Pattern ->
 4724: 			 ok;
 4725: 		     Other ->
 4726: 			 {error,{unexpected,Other}}
 4727: 		 end
 4728: 	 end)()).
 4729: 
 4730: mktmofun(Tmo,Parent,LS) ->
 4731:     fun() ->
 4732:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> try accept"),
 4733:             AcceptResult = catch gen_tcp:accept(LS, Tmo),            
 4734:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> accepted: "
 4735:                "~n   ~p", [AcceptResult]),
 4736:             Parent ! {accepted,self(), AcceptResult}
 4737:     end.
 4738: 
 4739: %% Accept tests
 4740: %% Test singular accept.
 4741: primitive_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4742:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4743:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4744:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4745:                             Addr;
 4746:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4747:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4748:                     end
 4749:            end,
 4750:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) end,
 4751:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4752:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4753: 
 4754: do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4755:     LSock =
 4756:         case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4757:             {ok, LS} ->
 4758:                 LS;
 4759:             {error, LReason} ->
 4760:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 4761:         end,
 4762:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LSock),
 4763:     Parent = self(),
 4764:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LSock)} end,
 4765:     P = spawn(F),
 4766:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4767:         {ok, _} ->
 4768:             ok;
 4769:         {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 4770:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 4771:     end,        
 4772:     receive
 4773:         {accepted,P,{ok,P0}} when is_port(P0) ->
 4774:             ok;
 4775:         {accepted,P,Other0} ->
 4776:             {error,Other0}
 4777:     after 500 ->
 4778:               {error,timeout}
 4779:     end.
 4780: 
 4781: 	
 4782: %% Closing listen socket when multi-accepting.
 4783: multi_accept_close_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4784:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4785:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4786:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4787:                             Addr;
 4788:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4789:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4790:                     end
 4791:            end,
 4792:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) end,
 4793:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4794:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4795: 
 4796: do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) ->
 4797:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 4798:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4799:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4800:                  LSocket;
 4801:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4802:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 4803:          end,
 4804:     Parent = self(),
 4805:     F = fun() ->
 4806:                 ?P("started"),
 4807:                 Accepted = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 4808:                 ?P("accept result: ~p", [Accepted]),
 4809:                 Parent ! {accepted,self(),Accepted}
 4810:         end,
 4811:     ?P("create acceptor processes"),
 4812:     spawn(F),
 4813:     spawn(F),
 4814:     spawn(F),
 4815:     spawn(F),
 4816:     ?P("sleep some"),
 4817:     ct:sleep(?SECS(2)),
 4818:     ?P("close (listen) socket"),
 4819:     gen_tcp:close(LS),
 4820:     ?P("await accepts"),
 4821:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}},
 4822:                           {_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}}],4,500),
 4823:     ?P("done"),
 4824:     ok.

 4999: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order after
 5000: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more).
 5001: accept_timeouts_in_order6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5002:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5003:     Pre  = fun() ->
 5004: 		   ?P("try get local address"),
 5005: 		   {ok, Addr} = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 5006: 		   ?P("try create listen socket"), 
 5007: 		   case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5008: 		       {ok, LSocket} ->
 5009: 			   #{socket => LSocket};
 5010: 		       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5011: 			   ?P("failed creating socket: ~p", [Reason]),
 5012: 			   {skip, listen_failed_str(Reason)}
 5013: 		   end
 5014: 	   end,
 5015:     TC   = fun(I) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(I) end,
 5016:     Post = fun(#{socket := LSock}) ->
 5017: 		   gen_tcp:close(LSock)
 5018: 	   end,
 5019:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5020:

 5022:     Parent = self(),

 5026:

 5028:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5029: 
 5030:     ?P("create acceptor 3 with timeout 600"),
 5031:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),
 5032: 
 5033:     ?P("create acceptor 4 with timeout 200"),
 5034:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(200,Parent,LS)),
 5035: 
 5036:     ?P("await accept timeouts from (in order): "
 5037:        "~n   Acceptor 4: ~p"
 5038:        "~n   Acceptor 2: ~p"
 5039:        "~n   Acceptor 3: ~p"
 5040:        "~n   Acceptor 1: ~p", [P4, P2, P3, P1]),
 5041:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{error,timeout}},
 5042:                           {P2,{error,timeout}},
 5043: 			  {P3,{error,timeout}},
 5044:                           {P1,{error,timeout}}],
 5045:                          infinity, 2000).

 5083: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts behave correctly when
 5084: %% mixed with successful timeouts.
 5085: %% Note that on Windows with inet_backend = socket we 
 5086: %% have *no* control over the accept order!
 5087: accept_timeouts_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5088:     Cond = fun() ->
 5089: 		   is_windows() andalso
 5090: 		       ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 5091: 		       ?SKIPT("Not compat with 'socket of Windows'"),
 5092: 		   ok
 5093: 	   end,
 5094:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5095:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5096:                             Addr;
 5097:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5098:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5099:                     end
 5100:            end,
 5101:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) end,
 5102:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5103:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5104: 
 5105: do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) ->
 5106:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5107:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5108:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5109:                  LSocket;
 5110:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5111:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5112:          end,
 5113:     Parent = self(),
 5114:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5115: 
 5116:     ?P("listen socket"
 5117:        "~n   ~p"
 5118:        "~n   Port: ~p", [LS, PortNo]),
 5119: 
 5120:     ?P("create acceptor process 1 (with timeout 1000)"),
 5121:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5122: 
 5123:     ?P("await 1 (~p) accepting", [P1]),
 5124:     wait_until_accepting(P1,500),
 5125: 
 5126:     ?P("create acceptor process 2 (with timeout 2000)"),
 5127:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(2000,Parent,LS)),
 5128: 
 5129:     ?P("await 2 (~p) accepting", [P2]),
 5130:     wait_until_accepting(P2,500),
 5131: 
 5132:     ?P("create acceptor process 3 (with timeout 3000)"),
 5133:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(3000,Parent,LS)),
 5134: 
 5135:     ?P("await 3 (~p) accepting", [P3]),
 5136:     wait_until_accepting(P3,500),
 5137: 
 5138:     ?P("create acceptor process 4 (with timeout 4000)"),
 5139:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(4000,Parent,LS)),
 5140: 
 5141:     ?P("await 4 (~p) accepting", [P4]),
 5142:     wait_until_accepting(P4,500),
 5143: 
 5144:     ?P("expect accept from 1 (~p) with timeout", [P1]),
 5145:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}}],infinity,1500),
 5146: 
 5147:     ?P("connect"),
 5148:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5149:         {ok, _} ->
 5150:             ok;
 5151:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 5152:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 5153:     end,
 5154: 
 5155:     ?P("expect accept from 2 (~p) with success", [P2]),
 5156:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5157:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,Port0}}] when is_port(Port0),
 5158:                                                         infinity,100);
 5159:        true ->
 5160:             case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,_}}],infinity,100) of
 5161: 		ok ->
 5162: 		    ok;
 5163: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 5164: 		    ?P("Failed accept: "
 5165: 		       "~n   P2:     ~p"
 5166: 		       "~n   Reason: ~p", [P2, Reason2]),
 5167: 		    ct:fail(unexpected_accepts)
 5168: 	    end
 5169:     end,
 5170: 
 5171:     ?P("expect accept from 3 (~p) with timeout", [P3]),
 5172:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P3,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000),
 5173: 
 5174:     ?P("connect"),
 5175:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5176:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 5177:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason3));
 5178:         _  ->
 5179:             ok
 5180:     end,
 5181: 
 5182:     ?P("expect accept from 4 (~p) with success", [P4]),
 5183:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5184:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,Port1}}] when is_port(Port1),
 5185:                                                         infinity,100);
 5186:        true ->
 5187:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,_Port1}}],infinity,100)
 5188:     end,
 5189: 
 5190:     ?P("done"),
 5191:     ok.
 5192: 
 5193: %% Check that single acceptor behaves as expected when killed.
 5194: killing_acceptor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5195:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5196:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5197:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5198:                             Addr;
 5199:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5200:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5201:                     end
 5202:            end,
 5203:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) end,
 5204:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5205:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5206: 
 5207: do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) ->
 5208:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5209:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5210:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5211:             do_killing_acceptor_inet(LSocket);
 5212:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5213:             do_killing_acceptor_socket(LSocket);
 5214:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5215:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5216:     end,
 5217:     ?P("done"),
 5218:     ok.
 5219: 
 5220: do_killing_acceptor_inet(LS) ->
 5221:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5222:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5223: 
 5224:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5225:     Pid = spawn(
 5226:             fun() ->
 5227:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5228:             end),
 5229:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5230:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5231:     end,
 5232: 
 5233:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5234:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5235: 
 5236:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5237:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5238:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5239:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5240:     end,
 5241: 
 5242:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5243:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5244: 
 5245:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5246:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5247:     ok.
 5248: 
 5249: do_killing_acceptor_socket(LS) ->
 5250:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5251:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5252: 
 5253:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5254:     Pid = spawn(
 5255:             fun() ->
 5256:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5257:             end),
 5258:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5259:     ct:sleep(100),
 5260: 
 5261:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5262:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5263: 
 5264:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5265:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5266:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5267:     ct:sleep(1000),
 5268: 
 5269:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5270:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5271: 
 5272:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5273:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5274:     ok.
 5275:     
 5276: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpStates, ExpNotStates) when is_port(LS) ->
 5277:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5278:         #{states := States} ->
 5279: 
 5280:             ?P("try validate (listen socket) state when: "
 5281:                "~n   Exp States:     ~p"
 5282:                "~n   Exp Not States: ~p"
 5283:                "~n   States:         ~p", [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5284: 
 5285:             %% State *shall* contain ExpStates => States1 =/= States
 5286:             States1 = States -- ExpStates,
 5287: 
 5288:             %% State shall *not* contain ExpNotStates => States2 =:= States
 5289:             States2 = States -- ExpNotStates,
 5290: 
 5291:             if
 5292:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5293:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5294:                     ?P("validated: "
 5295:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5296:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5297:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates]),
 5298:                     ok;
 5299:                true ->
 5300:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5301:                        "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5302:                        "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5303:                        "~n   States:              ~p",
 5304:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5305:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5306:             end;
 5307: 
 5308:         InvalidInfo ->
 5309:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5310:                "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5311:                "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5312:                "~n   Invalid Info:        ~p",
 5313:                [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, InvalidInfo]),
 5314:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5315:     end.
 5316: 
 5317: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, ExpNotState) ->
 5318:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5319:         #{num_acceptors := ExpNumAcc, rstates := States} ->
 5320:             ?P("try validate state when: "
 5321:                "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5322:                "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5323:                "~n   RStates:            ~p", [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5324: 
 5325:             %% States *shall* contain ExpState => States1 =/= States
 5326:             States1 = States -- ExpState,
 5327:             
 5328:             %% States shall *not* contain ExpNotState => States2 =:= States
 5329:             States2 = States -- ExpNotState,
 5330: 
 5331:             if
 5332:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5333:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5334:                     ?P("validated: "
 5335:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5336:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5337:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState]),
 5338:                     ok;
 5339:                true ->
 5340:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5341:                        "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5342:                        "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5343:                        "~n   States:             ~p",
 5344:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5345:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5346:             end;
 5347: 
 5348:         #{num_acceptors := NumAcc, rstates := RStates, wstates := WStates} ->
 5349:             ?P("invalid state: "
 5350:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5351:                "~n   Num Acceptors:          ~w"
 5352:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5353:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5354:                "~n   RStates:                ~p"
 5355:                "~n   WStates:                ~p",
 5356:                [ExpNumAcc, NumAcc, ExpState, RStates, WStates]),
 5357:             ct:fail("Invalid state");
 5358: 
 5359:         InvalidInfo ->
 5360:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5361:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5362:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5363:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5364:                "~n   Invalid Info:           ~p",
 5365:                [ExpNumAcc, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, InvalidInfo]),
 5366:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5367:     end.
 5368:     
 5369: 
 5370: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed.
 5371: killing_multi_acceptors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5372:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5373:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5374:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5375:                             Addr;
 5376:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5377:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5378:                     end
 5379:            end,
 5380:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) end,
 5381:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5382:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5383: 
 5384: do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) ->
 5385:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5386:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5387:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5388:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LSocket);
 5389:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5390:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LSocket);
 5391:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5392:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5393:     end,
 5394:     ?P("done"),
 5395:     ok.
 5396: 
 5397: do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LS) ->
 5398:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5399:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5400: 
 5401:     Parent = self(),
 5402:     F1  = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5403:     Tmo = 1000,
 5404:     F2  = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5405:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5406:     Pid1 = spawn(F1),
 5407:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5408:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5409: 
 5410:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5411:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5412: 
 5413:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5414:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5415: 
 5416:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5417:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 5418: 
 5419:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5420:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5421: 
 5422:     ?P("validate state - still accepting"),
 5423:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5424: 
 5425:     ?P("await second acceptor exit (timeout)"),
 5426:     %% In order to avoid race condition, double the time
 5427:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2, {error,timeout}}], 1, 2 * Tmo) of
 5428: 	ok ->
 5429: 	    ?P("second acceptor - expected result"),
 5430: 	    ok;
 5431: 	Any ->
 5432: 	    ?P("second acceptor - failed:"
 5433: 	       "~n      ~p", [Any]),
 5434: 	    %% Check what Pid2 is doing
 5435: 	    Pid2Info1 = process_info(Pid2),
 5436: 	    Pid2Msgs1 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5437: 	    %% Check if this is just a race...
 5438: 	    ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5439: 	    Pid2Info2 = process_info(Pid2),
 5440: 	    Pid2Msgs2 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5441: 	    ?P("second acceptor failed - check ~p"
 5442: 	       "~n      Info 1: ~p"
 5443: 	       "~n      Msgs 1: ~p"
 5444: 	       "~n   After 1 sec sleep:"
 5445: 	       "~n      Info 2: ~p"
 5446: 	       "~n      Msgs 2: ~p",
 5447: 	       [Pid2, Pid2Info1, Pid2Msgs1, Pid2Info2, Pid2Msgs2]),
 5448: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_accepts, Any})
 5449:     end,
 5450: 
 5451:     ?P("validate state - *not* accepting"),
 5452:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5453: 
 5454:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5455:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5456:     ok.
 5457: 
 5458: do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LS) ->
 5459:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5460:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5461: 
 5462:     Parent = self(),
 5463:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5464:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5465:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5466:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5467:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5468:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5469: 
 5470:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5471:     ct:sleep(100),
 5472: 
 5473:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5474:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5475: 
 5476:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5477:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5478:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5479:     ct:sleep(100),
 5480: 
 5481:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5482:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5483: 
 5484:     ?P("await second acceptor exit - timeout"),
 5485:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2,{error,timeout}}],1,1000),
 5486: 
 5487:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5488:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5489: 
 5490:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5491:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5492:     ok.

 5496: killing_multi_acceptors2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 5498:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5499:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5500:                             Addr;
 5501:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5502:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5503:                     end
 5504:            end,

 5506:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,

 5510:     ?P("create listen socket"),

 5512:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5513:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LSocket);

 5515:             do_killing_multi_acceptors2_socket(Config, LSocket);
 5516:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->

 5518:     end,

 5521: 
 5522: do_killing_multi_acceptors2_inet(Config, LS) ->
 5523:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5524:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5525: 
 5526:     Parent = self(),
 5527:     ?P("get port number for listen socket"),
 5528:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5529: 
 5530:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5531:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5532: 
 5533:     ?P("create acceptor process 1"),
 5534:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5535:     ?P("create acceptor process 2"),
 5536:     Pid2 = spawn(F),
 5537:     ?P("wait some"),
 5538:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5539:     end,
 5540: 
 5541:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5542:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5543: 
 5544:     ?P("kill acceptor 1"),
 5545:     exit(Pid,kill),
 5546: 
 5547:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5548:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5549:     end,
 5550: 
 5551:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5552:     {ok, L2} = prim_inet:getstatus(LS),
 5553:     true  = lists:member(accepting, L2),
 5554: 
 5555:     ?P("kill acceptor 2"),
 5556:     exit(Pid2, kill),
 5557: 
 5558:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5559:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5560:     end,
 5561: 
 5562:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5563:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5564: 
 5565:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5566:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5567: 
 5568:     ?P("wait some"),
 5569:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5570:     end,
 5571: 
 5572:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5573:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5574: 
 5575:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5576:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5577: 
 5578:     ?P("await accept"),
 5579:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok,CSock}}] when is_port(CSock),1,100),
 5580: 
 5581:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5582:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5583: 
 5584:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5585:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5586:     ok.
 5587:

 5651: 
 5652: %% Checks that multi-accept works when more than one accept can be
 5653: %% done at once (wb test of inet_driver).
 5654: several_accepts_in_one_go(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5655:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5656:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5657:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5658:                             Addr;
 5659:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5660:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5661:                     end
 5662:            end,
 5663:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) end,
 5664:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5665:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5666: 
 5667: do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) ->
 5668:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5669:     NumActors = 8,
 5670:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {backlog, NumActors}]) of
 5671:              {ok, LSock} ->
 5672:                  LSock;
 5673:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5674:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5675:          end,
 5676:     Parent = self(),
 5677:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5678:     F1 = fun() ->
 5679: 		 ?P("acceptor starting"),
 5680: 		 Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)}
 5681:          end,
 5682:     F2 = fun() ->
 5683: 		 ?P("connector starting"),
 5684: 		 Parent ! {connected,self(),
 5685:                            ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}])}
 5686:          end,
 5687:     Ns = lists:seq(1, NumActors),
 5688:     ?P("start acceptors"),
 5689:     _  = [spawn(F1) || _ <- Ns],
 5690:     ?P("await accept timeouts"),
 5691:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([],1,500), % wait for tmo
 5692:     ?P("start connectors"),
 5693:     _  = [spawn(F2) || _ <- Ns],
 5694:     ?P("await accepts"),
 5695:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],NumActors,15000),
 5696:     ?P("await connects"),
 5697:     ok = ?EXPECT_CONNECTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],1000),
 5698:     ?P("done"),
 5699:     ok.
 5700: 
 5701: flush(Msgs) ->
 5702:     erlang:yield(),
 5703:     receive Msg -> flush([Msg|Msgs])
 5704:     after     0 -> lists:reverse(Msgs)
 5705:     end.
 5706: 
 5707: wait_until_accepting(Proc,0) ->
 5708:     exit({timeout_waiting_for_accepting,Proc});
 5709: wait_until_accepting(Proc,N) ->
 5710:     case process_info(Proc,current_function) of
 5711:         {current_function, {prim_inet, accept0, 3}} ->
 5712:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5713:                 {status,waiting} ->
 5714: 		    ?P("[prim_inet] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5715:                     ok;
 5716:                 _O1 ->
 5717:                     receive 
 5718:                     after 5 ->
 5719:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5720:                     end
 5721:             end;
 5722:         {current_function, {gen, do_call, 4}} ->
 5723:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5724:                 {status,waiting} -> 
 5725: 		    ?P("[gen] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5726:                     ok;
 5727:                 _O1 ->
 5728:                     receive 
 5729:                     after 5 ->
 5730:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5731:                     end
 5732:             end;
 5733:         _O2 ->
 5734:             receive 
 5735:             after 5 ->
 5736:                     wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5737:             end
 5738:     end.
 5739: 
 5740: 
 5741: %% Check that accept returns {error, system_limit}
 5742: %% (and not {error, enfile}) when running out of ports.
 5743: accept_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5744:     Cond = fun() ->
 5745: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 5746: 		       true ->
 5747: 			   {skip, "Not compliant with socket"};
 5748: 		       false ->
 5749: 			   ok
 5750: 		   end
 5751: 	   end,
 5752:     TC   = fun() -> do_accept_system_limit(Config) end,
 5753:     ?TC_TRY(accept_system_limit, Cond, TC).
 5754: 
 5755: do_accept_system_limit(Config) ->
 5756:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5757:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, []) of
 5758:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5759:                  LSocket;
 5760:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5761:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5762:         end,             
 5763:     {ok, {Addr, Port}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5764:     ?P("listen socket \"bound\" to:"
 5765:        "~n      Address: ~p"
 5766:        "~n      Port:    ~p", [Addr, Port]),
 5767:     Me = self(),
 5768:     ?P("create connector"),
 5769:     Connector = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5770:                                    connector(Config, Port, Me)
 5771:                            end),
 5772:     ?P("sync with connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5773:     receive {Connector, sync} -> Connector ! {self(), continue} end,
 5774:     ?P("begin accepting"),
 5775:     ok = acceptor(Connector, LS, false, []),
 5776:     ?P("stop connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5777:     Connector ! stop,
 5778:     ?P("done"),
 5779:     ok.
 5780: 
 5781: acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, A) ->
 5782:     case gen_tcp:accept(LS, 1000) of
 5783:         {ok, S} ->
 5784:             acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, [S|A]);
 5785:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5786:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 5787:         {error, system_limit} ->
 5788:             ?P("acceptor: "
 5789:                "system limit => *almost* done (~w)", [length(A)]),
 5790:             acceptor(Connector, LS, true, A);
 5791:         {error, timeout} when GotSL ->
 5792:             ?P("acceptor: timeout (with system limit) => done (~w)",
 5793:                [length(A)]),
 5794:             ok;
 5795:         {error, timeout} ->
 5796:             ?P("acceptor: timeout *without* system limit => failure"
 5797:                "~n     Number of Accepted: ~w",
 5798:                [length(A)]),
 5799:             error
 5800:     end.
 5801: 
 5802: connector(Config, AccPort, Tester) ->
 5803:     ?P("[connector] start"),
 5804:     ManyPorts = open_ports([]),
 5805:     ?P("[connector] length(ManyPorts): ~p", [length(ManyPorts)]),
 5806:     Tester ! {self(), sync},
 5807:     ?P("[connector] await continute from tester (~p)", [Tester]),
 5808:     receive {Tester, continue} -> timer:sleep(100) end,
 5809:     ?P("[connector] begin connecting"),
 5810:     ConnF =
 5811:         fun(Port) ->
 5812:                 case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, {127,0,0,1}, AccPort)) of
 5813:                     {ok, Sock} ->
 5814:                         ?P("[connector] success: "
 5815:                            "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
 5816:                         Sock;
 5817:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5818:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 5819:                     _Error ->
 5820:                         ?P("[connector] failure: "
 5821:                            "~n      ~p", [_Error]),
 5822:                         port_close(Port)
 5823:                 end
 5824:         end,
 5825:     R = [ConnF(Port) || Port <- lists:sublist(ManyPorts, 10)],
 5826:     ?P("[connector] await stop"),
 5827:     receive stop -> ?P("[connector] stop (~w)", [length(R)]), R end.
 5828: 
 5829: open_ports(L) ->
 5830:     case catch open_port({spawn_driver, "ram_file_drv"}, []) of
 5831: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 5832: 	    open_ports([Port|L]);
 5833: 	{'EXIT', {system_limit, _}} ->
 5834: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:split(5, L),
 5835: 	    [port_close(Port) || Port <- L1],
 5836: 	    L2
 5837:     end.
 5838: 
 5839: 
 5840: %% Check that active once and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5841: active_once_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5842:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5843:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5844:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5845:                             Addr;
 5846:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5847:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5848:                     end
 5849:            end,
 5850:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5851:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5852:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5853: 
 5854: do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5855:     Send = fun(Socket, Data) ->
 5856:                    case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 5857:                        {error, #{info := econnaborted}} ->
 5858:                            {error, econnaborted};
 5859:                        X ->
 5860:                            X
 5861:                    end
 5862:            end,
 5863:     ?P("stage 1"),
 5864:     (fun() ->
 5865: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin setup"),
 5866: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5867: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin send"),
 5868: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5869:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5870: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5871: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A, [{active,once}]),
 5872: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed"),
 5873: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5874: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5875: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5876: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5877: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5878: 	     ?P("[stage1] done"),
 5879: 	     ok
 5880:      end)(),
 5881:     ?P("stage 2"),
 5882:     (fun() ->
 5883: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin setup"),
 5884: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5885: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin send"),
 5886: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5887:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5888: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5889: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5890: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed"),
 5891: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5892: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5893: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5894: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5895: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5896: 	     ?P("[stage2] done"),
 5897: 	     ok
 5898:      end)(),
 5899:     ?P("stage 3"),
 5900:     (fun() ->
 5901: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin setup"),
 5902: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5903: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin send"),
 5904: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5905:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5906: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5907: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5908: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed"),
 5909: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5910: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5911: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5912: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5913: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5914: 	     ?P("[stage3] done"),
 5915: 	     ok
 5916:      end)(),
 5917:     ?P("stage 4"),
 5918:     (fun() ->
 5919: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin setup"),
 5920: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5921: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin send"),
 5922: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5923: 			fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5924: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5925: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5926: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed"),
 5927: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5928: 	     ?P("[stage4] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5929: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5930: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5931: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5932: 	     ?P("[stage4] done"),
 5933: 	     ok
 5934:      end)(),
 5935:     ?P("stage 5"),
 5936:     (fun() ->
 5937: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin setup"),
 5938: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5939: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin send"),
 5940: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5941: 			fun() -> Send(A,"Hello") end),
 5942: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:false => expect success"),
 5943: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,false}]),
 5944: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed => expect timeout"),
 5945: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5946: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5947: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5948: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed"),
 5949: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5950: 	     ?P("[stage5] done"),
 5951: 	     ok
 5952:      end)(),
 5953:     ?P("done"),
 5954:     ok.

 5956: %% Check that active n and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5957: active_n_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5958:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5959:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5960:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5961:                             Addr;
 5962:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5963:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5964:                     end
 5965:            end,
 5966:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5967:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5968:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5969: 
 5970: do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5971:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5972:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 5973: 
 5974:     P = self(),
 5975: 
 5976:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 5977: 
 5978:     ClientF =
 5979:         fun() ->
 5980:                 ?P("[client] started"),
 5981:                 Payload = <<0:50000/unit:8>>,
 5982:                 Cnt = 10000,
 5983:                 ?P("[client] send size"),
 5984:                 P ! {size, Cnt * byte_size(Payload)},
 5985:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 5986:                 S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 5987:                                   [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 5988:                         {ok, CS} ->
 5989:                             ?P("[client] connected"),
 5990:                             P ! {continue, self()},
 5991:                             CS;
 5992:                         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5993:                             ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 5994:                     end,
 5995:                 ?P("[client] send payload"),
 5996:                 _ = [gen_tcp:send(S, Payload) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Cnt)],
 5997:                 ?P("[client] close socket"),
 5998:                 gen_tcp:close(S),
 5999:                 ?P("[client] done"),
 6000:                 exit(ok)
 6001:         end,
 6002:     ?P("create client process"),
 6003:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(ClientF),
 6004: 
 6005:     ?P("await size"),
 6006:     receive {size, SendSize} -> SendSize end,
 6007:     ?P("await continue or down"),
 6008:     receive
 6009:         {continue, Pid} ->
 6010:             ?P("got continue"),
 6011:             ok;
 6012:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 6013:             ?P("got *unexpected* skip"),
 6014:             gen_tcp:close(L),
 6015:             throw(SKIP);
 6016:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ConnectRes} ->
 6017:             ?P("got *unexpected* crash: "
 6018:               "~n   ~p", [ConnectRes]),
 6019:             exit({unexpected, connect, ConnectRes})
 6020:     end,
 6021:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6022:     inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6023:     ?P("start collecting data"),
 6024:     RecvSize = anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef),
 6025: 
 6026:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 6027:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 6028: 
 6029:     ?P("validate size"),
 6030:     if SendSize =:= RecvSize ->
 6031:             ?P("done"),
 6032:             ok;
 6033:        true ->
 6034:             ct:fail("Send and Recv size not equal: ~p ~p", [SendSize, RecvSize])
 6035:     end.
 6036: 
 6037: 
 6038: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef) ->
 6039:     anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, 0, false, false).
 6040: 
 6041: anc_await_closed_and_down(_S, _Pid, _MRef, Size, true, true) ->
 6042:     Size;
 6043: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down) ->
 6044:     receive
 6045:         {tcp, S, Bin} ->
 6046:             %% ?P("got a chunk (~w) of data", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 6047:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef,
 6048:                                       byte_size(Bin) + Size, Closed, Down);
 6049:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 6050:             ?P("got closed -> we are done: ~w", [Size]),
 6051:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, true, Down);
 6052:         {tcp_passive, S} ->
 6053:             %% ?P("got passive -> active"),
 6054:             inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6055:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6056:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ok} ->
 6057:             ?P("Received expected down message regarding client"),
 6058:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6059: 
 6060:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 6061:             ?P("Received UNEXPECTED down message regarding client:"
 6062:                "~n   Reason:    ~p"
 6063:                "~n   Port Info: ~p",
 6064:                [Reason, (catch erlang:port_info(S))]),
 6065:             ct:fail({unexpected_client_down, Reason}); 
 6066: 
 6067:        Msg ->
 6068:             ?P("ignore: ~p", [Msg]),
 6069:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down)
 6070:     end.
 6071:

 6073: send_timeout_cfg(Config) ->
 6074:     send_timeout_cfg(Config, default).
 6075: 
 6076: send_timeout_cfg(Config, Case) ->
 6077:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6078:         true when (Case =:= send_timeout_check_length) ->
 6079:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   5*1024};
 6080:         true ->
 6081:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 10*1024),  5*1024};
 6082:         false ->
 6083:             {1,   1000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   16*1024}
 6084:     end.

 6086: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6087: send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6088:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6089:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6090:                    ?P("create node"),
 6091:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6092: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6093:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6094:            end,
 6095:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6096:                    do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6097:            end,
 6098:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6099:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6100:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6101:            end,
 6102:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6103: 
 6104: do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6105:     ?P("begin"),
 6106:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6107:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6108: 		       false, RNode),
 6109:     ?P("done"),
 6110:     ok.
 6111: 
 6112: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6113: send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6114:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6115:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6116:                    ?P("create node"),
 6117:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6118: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6119:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6120:            end,
 6121:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6122:                    do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6123:            end,
 6124:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6125:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6126:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6127:            end,
 6128:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6129: 
 6130: do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6131:     ?P("begin"),
 6132:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6133:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose),
 6134:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6135: 		       true, RNode),
 6136:     ?P("done"),
 6137:     ok.
 6138: 
 6139: send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6140: 		   AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6141:     ?P("[basic] sink"),
 6142:     {A, Pid}              = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6143:                                                Addr, SndTimeout,
 6144:                                                AutoClose, SndBuf),
 6145:     Send                  = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6146:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout),
 6147: 
 6148:     %% Check that the socket is not busy/closed...
 6149:     ?P("[basic] verify socket not busy/closed"),
 6150:     case gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) of
 6151: 	{error, Reason} ->
 6152: 	    ?P("[basic] (expected) send failure"),
 6153: 	    after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason),
 6154: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6155: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6156: 	    ok;
 6157: 	ok ->
 6158:             %% Note that there is no active reader on the other end,
 6159:             %% so a 'channel' has been filled, should remain filled.
 6160: 	    ?P("[basic] UNEXPECTED send success"),
 6161: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6162: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6163: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected send success")
 6164:     end.
 6165:

 6167: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6168: send_timeout_check_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6169:     Cond = fun() ->
 6170:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6171:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6172:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6173:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6174:                        _ ->
 6175:                            ok
 6176:                    end
 6177:            end,
 6178:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6179:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6180:                    ?P("create node"),
 6181:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6182: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6183:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6184:            end,
 6185:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6186:                    do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, Node)
 6187:            end,
 6188:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6189:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6190:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6191:            end,
 6192:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6193: 
 6194: do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6195:     ?P("begin"),
 6196:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6197:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_check_length),
 6198: 
 6199:     %% Check timeout length.
 6200:     ?P("spawn sink process (check timeout length)"),
 6201:     Self = self(),
 6202:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 6203:                    fun() ->
 6204:                            {A, _} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6205: 						       Addr, SndTimeout,
 6206:                                                        true, SndBuf),
 6207:                            Send = fun() ->
 6208:                                           %% <TMP>
 6209:                                           %% snmp:enable_trace(),
 6210:                                           %% snmp:set_trace([{gen_tcp_socket,
 6211:                                           %%                  [{scope, send}]},
 6212:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,getopt}]},
 6213:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,send}]}],
 6214:                                           %%                [{timestamp, true},
 6215:                                           %%                 {return_trace, true}]),
 6216:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 6217:                                           Res = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6218:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 6219:                                           %% snmp:disable_trace(),
 6220:                                           %% </TMP>
 6221:                                           Self ! Res,
 6222:                                           Res
 6223:                                   end,
 6224:                            {{error, timeout}, _} =
 6225: 			       timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)
 6226:                    end),
 6227:     Diff = get_max_diff(Pid),
 6228:     ?P("Max time for send: ~p", [Diff]),
 6229:     true = (Diff > (SndTimeout - 500)) and (Diff < (SndTimeout + 500)),
 6230: 
 6231:     %% Wait for the process to die.
 6232:     ?P("await (timeout checker) process death"),
 6233:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, _} -> ok end,
 6234: 
 6235:     ?P("done"),
 6236:     ok.
