 6277: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6278: %% send_timeout/send_timeout_close behaves differently on 
 6279: %% inet_backend 'socket' (compared to inet), so we skip
 6280: %% this test case (until we can re-write).
 6281: send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6282:     Cond = fun() ->
 6283:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6284:                        true ->
 6285:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6286:                        false ->
 6287:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6288:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6289:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6290:                                    {skip,
 6291:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6292:                                _ ->
 6293:                                    ok
 6294:                            end
 6295:                    end
 6296:            end,
 6297:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6298:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6299:                    ?P("create node"),
 6300:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6301: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6302:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6303:            end,
 6304:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6305:                    do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6306:            end,
 6307:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6308:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6309:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6310:            end,
 6311:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6312: 
 6313: do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6314:     ?P("begin"),
 6315:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6316:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_para_w_autoclose),
 6317: 
 6318:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6319:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6320:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6321: 		      true, RNode),
 6322: 
 6323:     ?P("done"),
 6324:     ok.
 6325: 
 6326: send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, BufSz, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6327: 		  AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6328:     ?P("[para] sink -> entry with"
 6329:        "~n      size(BinData): ~p"
 6330:        "~n      BufSz:         ~p"
 6331:        "~n      SndTimeout:    ~p"
 6332:        "~n      AutoClose:     ~p",
 6333:        [byte_size(BinData), BufSz, SndTimeout, AutoClose]),
 6334:     {A, Pid} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6335:                                   Addr, SndTimeout, AutoClose, BufSz),
 6336:     Self = self(),
 6337:     SenderFun = fun() ->
 6338:                         ?P("[para:sender] starting"),
 6339: 			Send = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6340: 			Self ! {self(), timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)}
 6341: 		end,
 6342:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 1"),
 6343:     Snd1 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6344:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 2"),
 6345:     Snd2 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6346: 
 6347:     SockInfo    = fun() -> (catch inet:info(A)) end,
 6348:     SockTimeout = fun() ->
 6349:                           try inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout]) of
 6350:                               {ok, [V2]} ->
 6351:                                   V2;
 6352:                               {error, R2} ->
 6353:                                   ?F("ERROR: ~p", [R2]);
 6354:                               X2 ->
 6355:                                   ?F("UNKNOWN: ~p", [X2])
 6356:                           catch
 6357:                               C2:E2:S2 ->
 6358:                                   ?F("CAUGHT: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C2, E2, S2])
 6359:                           end
 6360:                   end,
 6361: 
 6362:     ?P("[para] await first sender timeout when"
 6363:        "~n   Sender 1: ~p"
 6364:        "~n   Sender 2: ~p", [Snd1, Snd2]),
 6365:     First =
 6366:         receive
 6367:             {Snd1, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6368:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)", [Snd1, N]),
 6369:                 1;
 6370:             {Snd2, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6371:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)", [Snd2, N]),
 6372:                 2;
 6373: 
 6374:             {'EXIT', _Pid, {timetrap_timeout, _Timeout, _Stack}} ->
 6375:                 %% The test case (timetrap) has timed out, which either means
 6376:                 %% we are running on very slow hw or some system functions
 6377:                 %% are slowing us down (this test case should never normally
 6378:                 %% time out like this).
 6379:                 ?P("Test case timetrap timeout - check for system events"),
 6380:                 case kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events(?SECS(5)) of
 6381:                     SysEvs when (SysEvs =/= []) ->
 6382:                         ?P("timetrap timeout with system events: "
 6383:                            "~n   System Events: ~p"
 6384:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6385:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6386:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6387:                            [SysEvs,
 6388:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6389:                             SockInfo()]),
 6390:                         ?SKIPT(?F("TC system ~w events", [length(SysEvs)]));
 6391:                     {error, Reason} ->
 6392:                         ?P("TC timetrap timeout but failed get system events: "
 6393:                            "~n   Reason:        ~p"
 6394:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6395:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6396:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6397:                            [Reason,
 6398:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6399:                             SockInfo()]),
 6400:                         exit({timetrap, {failed_get_sys_evs, Reason}});
 6401:                     [] ->
 6402:                         ?P("TC timetrap *without* system events: "
 6403:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6404:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6405:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6406:                            [process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6407:                             SockInfo()]),
 6408:                         exit(timetrap)
 6409:                 end
 6410: 
 6411:         after 20000 ->
 6412:                 SockInfo1 = SockInfo(),
 6413:                 SockTo1   = SockTimeout(),
 6414:                 ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(1,~w) when:"
 6415:                    "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6416:                    "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6417:                    "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6418:                    "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6419:                    "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6420:                    [AutoClose,
 6421:                     (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6422:                     (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6423:                     SockInfo1, SockTo1,
 6424:                     flush([])]),
 6425:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6426:                 Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6427:                 ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6428:                 exit({timeout, AutoClose})
 6429:         end,
 6430: 
 6431:     Second = if (First =:= 1) -> 2; true -> 1 end,
 6432:     ?P("[para] await second sender ~w error", [Second]),
 6433:     receive
 6434: 	{Snd1, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6435:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)",
 6436:                [Error_1, Snd1, N_1]),
 6437:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1);
 6438: 	{Snd2, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6439:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)",
 6440:                [Error_1, Snd2, N_1]),
 6441:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1)
 6442:     after 10000 ->
 6443:             if (Second =:= 1) ->
 6444:                     SockInfo21 = SockInfo(),
 6445:                     SockTo21   = SockTimeout(),
 6446:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6447:                        "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6448:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6449:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6450:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6451:                        [AutoClose,
 6452:                         (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6453:                         SockInfo21, SockTo21,
 6454:                         flush([])]),
 6455:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout};
 6456:                true ->
 6457:                     SockInfo22 = SockInfo(),
 6458:                     SockTo22   = SockTimeout(),
 6459:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6460:                        "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6461:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6462:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6463:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6464:                        [AutoClose,
 6465:                         (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6466:                         SockInfo22, SockTo22,
 6467:                         flush([])]),
 6468:                     Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout}
 6469:             end,
 6470:             ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6471: 	    exit({timeout, AutoClose, Second})
 6472:     end,
 6473: 
 6474:     ?P("[para] socket info: "
 6475:        "~n   ~p", [SockInfo()]),
 6476:     {error, Error_2} = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6477:     after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_2),
 6478:     ?P("[para] cleanup - await sender terminations"),
 6479:     st_await_sender_termination(Snd1, Snd2),
 6480:     ?P("[para] cleanup - close socket"),
 6481:     send_timeout_close(A),
 6482:     ?P("[para] cleanup - kill sink"),
 6483:     exit(Pid, kill),
 6484:     ?P("[para] done"),
 6485:     ok.
 6486: 
 6487: %% Spawn a closer process, transfer "ownership" of the socket
 6488: %% to it and then send it the socket (to close) at its leisure.
 6489: send_timeout_close(Sock) ->
 6490:     F = fun() ->
 6491:                 receive
 6492:                     {close, S} ->
 6493:                         (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 6494:                         exit(normal)
 6495:                 end
 6496:         end,
 6497:     Pid = spawn_link(F),
 6498:     case gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Pid) of
 6499:         ok ->
 6500:             Pid ! {close, Sock},
 6501:             ok;
 6502:         {error, Reason} ->
 6503:             ?P("failed transfering ownership to closer process: "
 6504:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6505:             exit(Pid, kill),
 6506:             (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock))
 6507:     end.
 6508:     
 6509: st_await_sender_termination(undefined, undefined) ->
 6510:     ok;
 6511: st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, Sender2) ->
 6512:     receive
 6513:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender1) ->
 6514:             ?P("sender 1 (~p) terminated: "
 6515:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6516:             st_await_sender_termination(undefined, Sender2);
 6517:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender2) ->
 6518:             ?P("sender 2 (~p) terminated: "
 6519:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6520:             st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, undefined)
 6521:     end.
 6522:             
 6523: get_max_diff(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 6524:     receive
 6525: 	ok ->
 6526: 	    get_max_diff2(0)
 6527:     after 10000 ->
 6528:             ?P("timeout awaiting first send result (ok) from sender ~p:"
 6529:                "~n   Sender process info: ~p",
 6530:                [Pid, pi(Pid)]),
 6531: 	    exit(timeout)
 6532:     end.
 6533: 
 6534: get_max_diff2(Max) ->
 6535:     T1 = millis(),
 6536:     receive
 6537: 	ok ->
 6538: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6539: 	    if
 6540: 		Diff > Max ->
 6541: 		    ?P("new max send time: ~w", [Diff]),
 6542: 		    get_max_diff2(Diff);
 6543: 		true ->
 6544: 		    get_max_diff2(Max)
 6545: 	    end;
 6546: 	{error, timeout} ->
 6547: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6548: 	    if
 6549: 		Diff > Max ->
 6550: 		    ?P("timeout diff (> prev max send to): ~w", [Diff]),
 6551: 		    Diff;
 6552: 		true ->
 6553: 		    Max
 6554: 	    end
 6555:     after 10000 ->
 6556:               exit(timeout)
 6557:     end.
 6558: 	    
 6559: after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason) ->
 6560:     case Reason of
 6561:         timeout              when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6562:         {timeout, _RestData} when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6563:         enotconn             when AutoClose =:= true  -> ok;
 6564: 	closed               when AutoClose           -> ok;
 6565:         _ ->
 6566:             ?P("after_send_timeout -> "
 6567:                "~n      AutoClose: ~w"
 6568:                "~n      Reason:    ~p", [AutoClose, Reason]),
 6569:             exit({after_send_timeout, AutoClose, Reason})
 6570:     end.
 6571: 
 6572: 
 6573: %% Test the send_timeout socket option for active sockets.
 6574: send_timeout_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6575:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6576:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6577:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6578:                             Addr;
 6579:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6580:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6581:                     end
 6582:            end,
 6583:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) end,
 6584:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6585:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6586: 
 6587: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) ->
 6588:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6589:     {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6590:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, false, RNode),
 6591:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, true, RNode),
 6592:     ?STOP_NODE(RNode),
 6593:     ok.
 6594: 
 6595: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6596:     {A,C} = setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, 1, AutoClose),
 6597:     inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6598:     Mad = spawn_link(RNode, fun() -> mad_sender(C) end),
 6599:     ListData = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
 6600:     F = fun() ->
 6601:                 ?P("[sink action] await data"),
 6602: 		receive
 6603: 		    {tcp, _Sock, _Data} ->
 6604:                         ?P("[sink action] active -> once"),
 6605: 			inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6606:                         ?P("[sink action] send payload"),
 6607: 			Res = gen_tcp:send(A, ListData),
 6608: 			Res;
 6609: 		    Unexpected ->
 6610: 			?P("[sink action] unexpected message: "
 6611:                            "~n      ~p", [Unexpected]),
 6612: 			Unexpected
 6613: 		end
 6614: 	end,
 6615:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(F, 1),
 6616:     unlink(Mad),
 6617:     exit(Mad, kill),
 6618:     flush(),
 6619:     ok.
 6620: 
 6621: mad_sender(S) ->
 6622:     put(action,  nothing),
 6623:     put(sent,    0),
 6624:     put(elapsed, 0),
 6625:     mad_sender(S, 0).
 6626: 
 6627: mad_sender(S, N) ->
 6628:     U = rand:uniform(1000000),
 6629:     put(action, send),
 6630:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6631:     Ret     = gen_tcp:send(S, integer_to_list(U)),
 6632:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6633:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6634:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 6635:     put(action, sent),
 6636:     N2 = N + 1,
 6637:     put(sent,   N2),
 6638:     case Ret of
 6639:         ok ->
 6640:             mad_sender(S, N + 1);
 6641:         {error, timeout} = ERROR1 ->
 6642:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: timeout"
 6643:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6644:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6645:                [N2,
 6646:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6647:             ERROR1;
 6648:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} = ERROR2 ->
 6649:             ?P("mad_sender -> "
 6650:                "send failed: timeout with ~w bytes of rest data"
 6651:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6652:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6653:                [rest_data_size(RestData),
 6654:                 N2,
 6655:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6656:             ERROR2;
 6657:         {error, Reason} = ERROR3 ->
 6658:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6659:                "~n   ~p"
 6660:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6661:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6662:                [Reason,
 6663:                 N2,
 6664:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6665:             ERROR3;
 6666:         ERROR4 ->
 6667:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6668:                "~n   ~p"
 6669:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6670:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6671:                [ERROR4,
 6672:                 N2,
 6673:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6674:             ERROR4
 6675:     end.
 6676: 
 6677: flush() ->
 6678:     receive
 6679: 	_X ->
 6680: 	    flush()
 6681:     after 0 ->
 6682: 	    ok
 6683:     end.
 6684: 
 6685: setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr) ->
 6686:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6687:     ?P("[setup] start node"),
 6688:     R = case ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir) of
 6689:             {ok, Node} ->
 6690:                 Node;
 6691:             {error, Reason} ->
 6692:                 ?SKIPT(?F("failed starting node: ~p", [Reason]))
 6693:         end,
 6694:     ?P("[setup] get (\"proper\")local address"),
 6695:     {ok, Addr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(inet),
 6696: %%%     Host = get_hostname(node()),
 6697:     ?P("[setup] create listen socket (with ~p)", [Addr]),
 6698:     L = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{packet,2}]) of
 6699:             {ok, LSock} ->
 6700:                 LSock;
 6701:             {error, eaddrnotavail = LReason} ->
 6702:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6703:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 6704:         end,
 6705:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6706:     ?P("[setup] listen socket port: "
 6707:        "~n   Port: ~p", [Port]),
 6708:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6709:                   receive
 6710:                       {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6711:                           From ! {self(),X()}, F(F);
 6712:                       die -> ok
 6713:                   end
 6714:           end,
 6715:     ?P("[setup] create remote runner"),
 6716:     Pid = rpc:call(R,erlang,spawn,[fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6717:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6718:                      Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6719:                      receive {Pid,X} -> X end
 6720:              end,
 6721:     Connect = fun() -> 
 6722:                       ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6723:                                [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {packet, 2}]) 
 6724:               end,
 6725:     ?P("[setup] create (remote) connection"),
 6726:     C = case Remote(Connect) of
 6727:             {ok, CSock} ->
 6728:                 CSock;
 6729:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 6730:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6731:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 6732:         end,
 6733:     ?P("[setup] accept (local) connection"),
 6734:     A = case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 6735:             {ok, ASock} ->
 6736:                 ASock;
 6737:             {error, eaddrnotavail = AReason} ->
 6738:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6739:                 ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason))
 6740:         end,
 6741:     ?P("[setup] send (local) and receive (remote) message"),
 6742:     gen_tcp:send(A,"Hello"),
 6743:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6744:     ?P("[setup] close (remote) connection"),
 6745:     ok =  Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:close(C) end),
 6746:     Loop2 = fun(_,_,_,0) ->
 6747: 		    {failure, timeout}; 
 6748: 	       (L2,{MA,MB},F2,N) ->
 6749: 		    case F2() of
 6750: 			MA -> ?P("[setup] action result (MA): ~p", [MA] ), MA;
 6751: 			MB -> ?P("[setup] action result (MB): ~p", [MB] ), MB;
 6752: 			Other -> ?P("[setup] Loop2: ~p",[Other]),
 6753: 				 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 6754: 				 L2(L2,{MA,MB},F2,N-1)
 6755: 		    end
 6756: 	    end,
 6757:     Loop = fun(Match2,F3) ->  Loop2(Loop2,Match2,F3,10) end,
 6758:     ?P("[setup] stop node"),
 6759:     ?STOP_NODE(R),
 6760:     ?P("[setup] done"),
 6761:     {Loop,A}.
 6762:     
 6763: setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose, BufSz) ->
 6764:     ?P("[sink setup] create listen socket"),
 6765:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ifaddr,             Addr},
 6766:                                   {active,             false},
 6767: 				  {packet,             4},
 6768: 				  {sndbuf,             BufSz},
 6769: 				  {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6770: 				  {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}]),
 6771: 
 6772:     ?P("listen socket created with: "
 6773:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p",
 6774:        [oki(inet:getopts(L, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6775:     Fun = fun(N, F) ->
 6776: 		  receive
 6777: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6778: 			  From ! {self(),X()}, F(N+1,F);
 6779:                       {From, iterations} ->
 6780:                           From ! {self(), N}, F(N, F);
 6781: 		      die ->
 6782:                           ok
 6783: 		  end
 6784: 	  end,
 6785:     ?P("[sink setup] start remote runner process (on ~p)", [RNode]),
 6786:     Pid =  rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(0,Fun) end]),
 6787:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6788:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6789: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6790: 		     receive
 6791:                          {Pid,X} -> X
 6792: 		     end
 6793: 	     end,
 6794:     ?P("[sink setup] connect from remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6795:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6796: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6797: 				      [{ifaddr, Addr},
 6798:                                        {active, false},
 6799: 				       {packet, 4},
 6800: 				       {recbuf, BufSz div 2},
 6801: 				       {sndbuf, BufSz div 2}])
 6802: 		     end),
 6803:     ?P("[sink setup] accept"),
 6804:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6805:     ?P("[sink setup] accepted with options: "
 6806:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p"
 6807:        "~n   => send 'test' message",
 6808:        [oki(inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6809:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6810:     ?P("[sink setup] 'test' message sent - "
 6811:        "recv 'test' message on remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6812:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6813:     ?P("[sink setup] cleanup - close listen socket"),
 6814:     (catch gen_tcp:close(L)),
 6815: 
 6816:     ?P("[sink setup] done when: "
 6817:        "~n   Accepted socket: ~p"
 6818:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6819:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6820:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p"
 6821:        "~n   Connected socket: ~p"
 6822:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6823:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6824:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p",
 6825:        [A,
 6826:         oki(inet:getopts(A, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf])),
 6827:         oki(inet:sockname(A)),
 6828:         oki(inet:peername(A)),
 6829:         C,
 6830:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:getopts(C, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf]) end)),
 6831:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:sockname(C) end)),
 6832:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:peername(C) end))]),
 6833: 
 6834:     ?P("[sink setup] done"),
 6835: 
 6836:     {A, Pid}.
 6837: 
 6838: oki({ok, V}) -> V;
 6839: oki(E)       -> E.
 6840: 
 6841: setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose) ->
 6842:     ListenOpts =  [binary,
 6843:                    {ifaddr,             Addr},
 6844: 		   {active,             false},
 6845: 		   {packet,             0},
 6846: 		   {nodelay,            true},
 6847: 		   {keepalive,          true},
 6848: 		   {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6849: 		   {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}],
 6850:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 6851:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6852: 		  receive
 6853: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6854: 			  From ! {self(),X()},
 6855: 			  F(F);
 6856: 		      die -> ok
 6857: 		  end
 6858: 	  end,
 6859:     Pid = rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6860:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6861:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6862: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6863: 		     receive {Pid,X} -> X
 6864: 		     end
 6865: 	     end,
 6866:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6867: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip,     Addr},
 6868: 			                                   {active, false}])
 6869: 		     end),
 6870:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6871:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6872:     {ok, "H"++_} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C, 0) end),
 6873:     {A, C}.
 6874: 
 6875: %% timeout_sink_loop(Action) ->
 6876: %%     timeout_sink_loop(Action, 1).
 6877: 
 6878: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To) ->
 6879:     put(action,   nothing),
 6880:     put(sent,     0),
 6881:     put(elapsed,  0),
 6882:     put(send_max, 0),
 6883:     put(lsendts,  "-"), % Last Send TS (time stamp)
 6884:     timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, 0).
 6885: 
 6886: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N) ->
 6887:     put(action, send),
 6888:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6889:     Ret     = Action(),
 6890:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6891:     LSendTS = ?FTS(),
 6892:     SendT   = Stop - Start,
 6893:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6894:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + SendT),
 6895:     SendMax = get(send_max),
 6896:     if (SendT > SendMax) -> put(send_max, SendT);
 6897:        true              -> ok
 6898:     end,
 6899:     put(action, sent),
 6900:     put(lsendts, LSendTS),
 6901:     N2 = N + 1,
 6902:     put(sent,   N2),
 6903:     case Ret of
 6904: 	ok ->
 6905: 	    receive
 6906:                 {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout} ->
 6907:                     ?P("[sink-loop] info and die: "
 6908:                        "~n   Socket Info:  ~p"
 6909:                        "~n   Send Timeout: ~p",
 6910:                        [SockInfo(), SockTimeout()]),
 6911:                     exit(normal)
 6912:             after To -> ok end,
 6913: 	    timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N+1);
 6914: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 6915:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6916:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6917:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6918:                "~n   Result:            timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 6919:                [N2,
 6920:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6921:                 rest_data_size(RestData)]),
 6922: 	    {{error, timeout}, N2};
 6923: 	Other ->
 6924:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6925:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6926:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6927:                "~n   Result:            ~p",
 6928:                [N2,
 6929:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6930:                 Other]),
 6931: 	    {Other, N2}
 6932:     end.
 6933: 
 6934: 
 6935: rest_data_size(Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 6936:     byte_size(Bin);
 6937: rest_data_size([]) ->
 6938:     0;
 6939: rest_data_size([Bin|IOVec]) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 6940:     byte_size(Bin) + rest_data_size(IOVec).
 6941: 
 6942: 
 6943: %% =========================================================================
 6944: 
 6945: send_timeout_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6946:     ct:timetrap(?SECS(16)),
 6947:     Cond = fun() ->
 6948:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6949:                        true ->
 6950:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6951:                        false ->
 6952:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6953:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6954:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6955:                                    {skip,
 6956:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6957:                                _ ->
 6958:                                    ok
 6959:                            end
 6960:                    end
 6961:            end,
 6962:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6963:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6964:                    ?P("create node"),
 6965:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6966:                    RNode
 6967:            end,
 6968:     Case = fun(Node) -> do_send_timeout_resume(Config, Node, 13) end,
 6969:     Post = fun(Node) ->
 6970:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6971:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6972:            end,
 6973:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6974: 
 6975: do_send_timeout_resume(Config, RNode, BlockPow) ->
 6976:     BlockSize = 1 bsl BlockPow,
 6977:     1         = rand:uniform(1),
 6978:     Seed      = rand:export_seed(),
 6979:     ListenOpts =
 6980:         [inet,
 6981:          binary,
 6982:          {backlog, 2},
 6983:          {active,  false}],
 6984:     ConnectOpts =
 6985:         [inet,
 6986:          {send_timeout, 0},
 6987:          {active,       false},
 6988:          binary],
 6989:     StreamOpts =
 6990:         [{high_watermark, BlockSize},
 6991:          {low_watermark,  BlockSize bsr 1},
 6992:          {sndbuf,         BlockSize},
 6993:          {recbuf,         BlockSize},
 6994:          {buffer,         BlockSize bsl 1}],
 6995:     Client = self(),
 6996:     Tag = make_ref(),
 6997:     {Server, Mref} =
 6998:         spawn_opt(
 6999:           RNode,
 7000:           fun () ->
 7001:                   send_timeout_resume_srv(
 7002:                     Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts)
 7003:           end, [monitor, link]),
 7004:     ?P("Client=~p Server=~p Tag=~p~n", [Client, Server, Tag]),
 7005:     receive
 7006:         {Tag, port, Port} ->
 7007:             ok;
 7008:         {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Port} ->
 7009:             %% Use variable Port just to get export from case
 7010:             ct:fail(Port)
 7011:     end,
 7012:     ?P("connecting to ~p~n", [Port]),
 7013:     {ok, C} = ?CONNECT(Config, localhost, Port, ConnectOpts, 2000),
 7014:     try
 7015:         ok = inet:setopts(C, StreamOpts),
 7016:         ?P("client StreamOpts: ~p~n",
 7017:            [inet:getopts(C, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7018:         receive
 7019:             {Tag, send} ->
 7020:                 ok;
 7021:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Error2} ->
 7022:                 ct:fail(Error2)
 7023:         end,
 7024:         RetryTimeout = str_which_retry_timeout(),
 7025:         ?P("send"),
 7026:         {N, Timeouts} =
 7027:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(C, Server, Tag,
 7028:                                         RetryTimeout, BlockSize),
 7029:         ?P("await server (~p) reply (DOWN)", [Server]),
 7030:         receive
 7031:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Result} ->
 7032:                 ?P("received DOWN message from server:"
 7033:                    "~n   N:        ~p"
 7034:                    "~n   Timeouts: ~p"
 7035:                    "~n   Result:   ~p", [N, Timeouts, Result]),
 7036:                 case Result of
 7037:                     {Tag, ok, Count}
 7038:                       when Count =:= N * BlockSize,
 7039:                            %% We should get 10 time-outs.
 7040:                            %% If we do not get more than one, it seems
 7041:                            %% we get stuck when trying to poll the
 7042:                            %% send buffer with send_timeout = 0,
 7043:                            %% so that did not work
 7044:                            1 < Timeouts ->
 7045:                         ?P("count checked out"),
 7046:                         ok;
 7047:                     {Tag, ok, Count} when Count =:= N * BlockSize ->
 7048:                         ?P("Unexpected number of timeouts: ~w", [Timeouts]),
 7049:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7050:                     {Tag, ok, Count} ->
 7051:                         ?P("Unexpected counts: "
 7052:                            "~n      Got:      ~p"
 7053:                            "~n      Expected: ~p", [Count, N*BlockSize]),
 7054:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7055:                     {Tag, Res, _Count} ->
 7056:                         ?P("Unexpected res: "
 7057:                            "~n      Res: ~p", [Res]),
 7058:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7059:                     _ ->
 7060:                         ct:fail(Result)
 7061:                 end
 7062:         end
 7063:     after
 7064:         ?P("after: kill (failsafe) server"),
 7065:         exit(Server, failsafe),
 7066:         ?P("after: close socket"),
 7067:         gen_tcp:close(C),
 7068:         ?P("after: done"),
 7069:         ok
 7070:     end.
 7071: 
 7072: optnames(Opts) ->
 7073:     [Name || {Name, _} <- Opts].
 7074: 
 7075: str_which_retry_timeout() ->
 7076:     case os:type() of
 7077:         {unix, darwin} ->
 7078:             %% This is really sketchy, but it seems to "work"...
 7079:             %% Don't know if its the processor (M1) or if its the
 7080:             %% OS/darwin version (darwin 21.x).
 7081:             %% But since we don't have any intel macs running 21...
 7082:             case os:version() of
 7083:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 20) ->
 7084:                     25;
 7085:                 _ ->
 7086:                     100
 7087:             end;
 7088:         {unix, freebsd} ->
 7089:             %% Has seen this on FreeBSD 12.2 and later.
 7090:             case os:version() of
 7091:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 13) ->
 7092:                     25;
 7093:                 {Major, Minor, _} when (Major =:= 12) andalso
 7094:                                        (Minor >= 2) ->
 7095:                     25;
 7096:                 _ ->
 7097:                     100
 7098:             end;
 7099:         _ ->
 7100:             100
 7101:     end.
 7102:     
 7103: %% Fill buffers
 7104: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7105:     ?P("try send-timeout-resume with"
 7106:        "~n   RetryTimeout: ~w ms"
 7107:        "~n   BlockSize:    ~w", [RetryTimeout, BlockSize]),
 7108:     do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, 0, RetryTimeout, BlockSize).
 7109: 
 7110: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, N, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7111:     Bin = random_data(BlockSize),
 7112:     case send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, 0) of
 7113:         0 ->
 7114:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag,
 7115:                                         N + 1, RetryTimeout, BlockSize);
 7116:         Timeouts ->
 7117:             ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7118:             {N + 1, Timeouts}
 7119:     end.
 7120: 
 7121: send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, Timeouts) ->
 7122:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Bin) of
 7123:         ok ->
 7124:             ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> success => done when"
 7125:                "~n      N:           ~p"
 7126:                "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7127:                "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7128:             Timeouts;
 7129:         {error, Reason} ->
 7130:             case Reason of
 7131:                 timeout ->
 7132:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout:"
 7133:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7134:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7135:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7136:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7137:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7138:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7139:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7140:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7141:                       S, Server, Tag, N, <<>>, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7142:                 {timeout, RestData} ->
 7143:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout with RestData: "
 7144:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7145:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7146:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7147:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7148:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7149:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7150:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7151:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7152:                       S, Server, Tag, N, RestData, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7153:                 _ ->
 7154:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> unexpected send failure: "
 7155:                        "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 7156:                        "~n   when"
 7157:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7158:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7159:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7160:                        [Reason, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7161:                     error({Reason, N, Timeouts})
 7162:             end
 7163:     end.
 7164: 
 7165: random_data(0) ->
 7166:     <<>>;
 7167: random_data(Size) ->
 7168:     <<(rand:uniform(256) - 1), (random_data(Size - 1))/binary>>.
 7169: 
 7170: compare_data(<<>>, Count) ->
 7171:     Count;
 7172: compare_data(<<Byte, Bin/binary>>, Count) ->
 7173:     case rand:uniform(256) - 1 of
 7174:         Byte ->
 7175:             compare_data(Bin, Count + 1);
 7176:         _ ->
 7177:             error({diff, Count})
 7178:     end.
 7179: 
 7180: send_timeout_resume_srv(Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts) ->
 7181:     rand:seed(Seed),
 7182:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 7183:     ?P("[server] get listen StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7184:        [inet:getopts(L, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7185:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 7186:     Client ! {Tag, port, P},
 7187:     %%
 7188:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L, 2000),
 7189:     ?P("[server] accept success ~p", [A]),
 7190:     ok = inet:setopts(A, StreamOpts),
 7191:     ?P("[server] get accept StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7192:        [inet:getopts(A, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7193:     Client ! {Tag, send},
 7194:     %%
 7195:     receive
 7196:         {Tag, rec} ->
 7197:             ?P("[server] received recv command - now wait some time"),
 7198:             receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 7199:             ?P("[server] begin receiving (on ~p)", [A]),
 7200:             exit({Tag, ok, send_timeout_resume_srv(A, 0)})
 7201:     end.
 7202: 
 7203: send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count) ->
 7204:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0) of
 7205:         {ok, Data} ->
 7206:             Count_1 = compare_data(Data, Count),
 7207:             send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count_1);
 7208:         {error, closed} ->
 7209:             Count;
 7210:         {error, Reason} ->
 7211:             error({Reason, Count})
 7212:     end.
 7213: 
 7214: 
 7215: 
 7216: has_superfluous_schedulers() ->
 7217:     case {erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 7218: 	  erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 7219: 	{S, unknown} when S > 1 -> true;
 7220: 	{S, P} when S > P -> true;
 7221: 	_ -> false
 7222:     end.
 7223: 
 7224: 
 7225: %% Leaking message from inet_drv {inet_reply,P,ok}
 7226: %% when a socket sending resumes working after a send_timeout.
 7227: %% Should we even bother testing this if 'inet_backend = socket'?
 7228: otp_7731(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7229:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7230:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7231:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7232:                             Addr;
 7233:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7234:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7235:                     end
 7236:            end,
 7237:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) end,
 7238:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7239:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7240: 
 7241: do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) ->
 7242:     ?P("[ctrl] create server"),
 7243:     ME = self(),
 7244:     ServerPid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, ME) end),
 7245:     ?P("[ctrl] await listening port (number) from server"),
 7246:     receive {ServerPid, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7247: 
 7248:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server on port ~w", [PortNum]),
 7249:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7250:                             [binary,
 7251:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7252:                              {active,       false},
 7253:                              {packet,       raw},
 7254:                              {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7255: 
 7256:     ?P("[ctrl] send data"),
 7257:     otp_7731_send(Socket),
 7258:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - order server to recv"),
 7259:     ServerPid ! {self(), recv},
 7260:     ?P("[ctrl] await 'recv complete' from server"),
 7261:     receive {ServerPid, ok} -> ?P("[ctrl] received 'recv complete'"), ok end,
 7262: 
 7263:     %% Now make sure inet_drv does not leak any internal messages.
 7264:     ?P("[ctrl] waiting for leaking messages..."),
 7265:     receive Msg ->
 7266:             ?P("[ctrl] got unexpected message: "
 7267:                "~n      ~p", [Msg]),
 7268: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 7269:     after 1000 ->
 7270: 	    ok
 7271:     end,
 7272:     ?P("[ctrl] no leaking messages - cleanup"),
 7273:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Socket)),
 7274:     ServerPid ! {self(), die},
 7275:     ?P("[ctrl] done."),
 7276:     ok.
 7277:     
 7278: otp_7731_send(Socket) ->
 7279:     Bin = <<1:10000>>,
 7280:     ?P("[client] sending ~p bytes...", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 7281:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin) of
 7282:         ok ->
 7283:             otp_7731_send(Socket);
 7284:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7285:             ?P("[client] send timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 7286:                [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7287:             ok;
 7288:         {error, timeout} ->
 7289:             ?P("[client] send timeout"),
 7290:             ok
 7291:     end.
 7292: 
 7293: otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7294:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 7295:     {ok, LSocket} =
 7296:         ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw}, {active, false}]),
 7297:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7298:     ?P("[server] listening on port number ~p", [PortNum]),
 7299:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7300: 
 7301:     ?P("[server] accept"),
 7302:     {ok, CSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7303:     ?P("[server] accepted - close listen socket"),
 7304:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7305: 
 7306:     ?P("[server] await recv order"),
 7307:     receive {Ctrl, recv} -> ok end,
 7308:     
 7309:     ?P("[server] start receiving..."),
 7310:     otp_7731_recv(CSocket),
 7311: 
 7312:     ?P("[server] announce recv done"),
 7313:     Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7314: 
 7315:     ?P("[server] finished, (connection) closing..."),
 7316:     gen_tcp:close(CSocket),
 7317:     receive {Ctrl, die} -> ok end,
 7318:     ?P("[server] done"),
 7319:     exit(normal).
 7320: 
 7321: 
 7322: otp_7731_recv(Socket) ->
 7323:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7324:         {ok, Bin} ->
 7325:             ?P("[server] received ~p bytes", [size(Bin)]),
 7326:             otp_7731_recv(Socket);
 7327:         {error, timeout} ->
 7328:             ?P("[server] receive timeout - done recv"),
 7329:             ok
 7330:     end.
 7331: 
 7332: 
 7333: %% OTP-7615: TCP-ports hanging in CLOSING state when sending large
 7334: %% buffer followed by a recv() that returns error due to closed
 7335: %% connection.
 7336: %% OTP-7615 Leaking closed ports.
 7337: %% This is a specific inet-driver bug, skip this when using 'socket'
 7338: zombie_sockets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7339:     Cond = fun() ->
 7340:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7341:                        true ->
 7342:                            {skip, "Inet driver specific test"};
 7343:                        false ->
 7344:                            ok
 7345:                    end
 7346:            end,
 7347:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7348:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7349:                             Addr;
 7350:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7351:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7352:                     end
 7353:            end,
 7354:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) end,
 7355:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7356:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7357: 
 7358: do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) ->
 7359:     register(zombie_collector,self()),
 7360:     Calls = 10,
 7361:     ?P("create zombie server"),
 7362:     Server = spawn_link(?MODULE, zombie_server, [Config, Addr, self(), Calls]),
 7363:     {Server, ready, PortNum} = receive Msg -> Msg  end,
 7364:     ?P("Ports before = ~p",[lists:sort(erlang:ports())]),
 7365:     zombie_client_loop(Config, Calls, Addr, PortNum),
 7366:     Ports = lists:sort(zombie_collector(Calls, [])),
 7367:     Server ! terminate,
 7368:     ?P("Collected ports = ~p", [Ports]),
 7369:     [] = zombies_alive(Ports, 10),
 7370:     timer:sleep(1000),
 7371:     ?P("done"),
 7372:     ok.
 7373: 
 7374: zombie_client_loop(_Config, 0, _, _) ->
 7375:     ?P("[zombie client] done"),
 7376:     ok;
 7377: zombie_client_loop(Config, N, Addr, PortNum) when is_integer(PortNum) ->
 7378:     ?P("[zombie client][~w] try connect", [N]),
 7379:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7380:                             [binary,
 7381:                              {ip,     Addr},
 7382:                              {active, false},
 7383:                              {packet, raw}]),
 7384:     ?P("[zombie client] connected - now close ~p", [Socket]),
 7385:     gen_tcp:close(Socket), % to make server recv fail
 7386:     zombie_client_loop(Config, N-1, Addr, PortNum).
 7387: 
 7388: 
 7389: zombie_collector(0, Acc) ->
 7390:     ?P("[zombie collector] done: "
 7391:        "~n   ~p", [Acc]),
 7392:     Acc;
 7393: zombie_collector(N, Acc) ->
 7394:     receive 
 7395: 	{closed, Socket} -> 
 7396:             ?P("[zombie collector] ~p closed", [Socket]),
 7397: 	    zombie_collector(N-1, [Socket|Acc]);
 7398: 	E -> 
 7399: 	    {unexpected, E, Acc}
 7400:     end.
 7401: 	    
 7402: zombies_alive(Ports, WaitSec) ->
 7403:     Alive = lists:sort(erlang:ports()),
 7404:     ?P("[zombies alive][~w] Alive: ~p", [WaitSec, Alive]),
 7405:     Zombies = lists:filter(fun(P) -> lists:member(P, Alive) end, Ports),
 7406:     case Zombies of
 7407: 	[] -> [];
 7408: 	_ ->
 7409: 	    case WaitSec of
 7410: 		0 -> Zombies;
 7411: 		_ -> timer:sleep(1000), % Wait some more for zombies to die
 7412: 		     zombies_alive(Zombies, WaitSec-1)
 7413: 	    end
 7414:     end.
 7415: 
 7416: zombie_server(Config, Addr, Pid, Calls) ->
 7417:     ?P("[zombie server] try create listen socket with backlog: ~w", [Calls]),
 7418:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw},
 7419:                                       {active, false}, {backlog, Calls}]),
 7420:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 7421:     ?P("[zombie server] Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSock, PortNum]),
 7422:     BigBin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100*1024, 77)),
 7423:     ?P("[zombie server] send ready"),
 7424:     Pid ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7425:     zombie_accept_loop(LSock, BigBin, Calls),
 7426:     ?P("[zombie server] await terminate"),
 7427:     terminate = receive Msg -> Msg end,
 7428:     ?P("[zombie server] terminating"),
 7429:     ok.
 7430: 
 7431: zombie_accept_loop(_, _, 0) ->
 7432:     ?P("[zombie server] accept loop done"),
 7433:     ok;
 7434: zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls) ->
 7435:     ?P("[zombie server][~w] try accept", [Calls]),
 7436:     case gen_tcp:accept(Socket) of
 7437: 	{ok, NewSocket} ->
 7438:             ?P("[zombie server][~w] accepted ~p - create handler",
 7439:                [Calls, NewSocket]),
 7440: 	    spawn_link(fun() -> zombie_server_handler(NewSocket, BigBin) end),
 7441: 	    zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls-1);
 7442: 	E ->
 7443: 	    E
 7444:     end.
 7445: 
 7446: zombie_server_handler(Socket, Bin) ->
 7447:     ?P("[zombie server handler] got connection on ~p - attempt send", [Socket]),
 7448:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin),
 7449:     ?P("[zombie server handler] Sent data, waiting for reply on ~p", [Socket]),
 7450:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 4) of
 7451:         {error, closed} ->
 7452:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: closed (expected)"),
 7453:             ok;
 7454:         {error, econnaborted} -> % may be returned on Windows
 7455:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: econnaborted (expected)"),
 7456:             ok;
 7457:         {error, Reason} ->
 7458:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv failure reason: ~p",
 7459:                [Reason]),
 7460:             exit({unexpected_recv_error_reason, Reason});
 7461:         {ok, _} ->
 7462:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv success"),
 7463:             exit(unexpected_recv_success)
 7464: 	  end,
 7465:     ?P("[zombie server handler] close socket ~p", [Socket]),
 7466:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7467:     ?P("[zombie server handler] socket closed: inform collector"),
 7468:     zombie_collector ! {closed, Socket}.
 7469: 
 7470: 
 7471: %% Hanging send on windows when sending iolist with more than 16 binaries.
 7472: otp_7816(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7473:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(2)),
 7474:     Cond = fun() ->
 7475: 		   %% With 'socket on Windows' we have actually no way to
 7476: 		   %% actually *know* that nothing is sent even after a timeout
 7477: 		   %% (and the send cancel that socket issues). The I/O 
 7478: 		   %% Completion Port framework may well have buffers still
 7479: 		   %% handle the data and send it as soon as it can.
 7480: 		   %% Basically, data is "out of our hands" as soon as we
 7481: 		   %% give it to the framework. Cancel may have "no effect"
 7482: 		   %% even if the completion operation is reported as
 7483: 		   %% 'aborted'.
 7484: 		   %% So, this test case simply does not work.
 7485: 		   case os:type() of
 7486: 		        {win32, nt} ->
 7487: 			   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7488: 			       true ->
 7489: 				   {skip,
 7490: 				    "Not compatible with 'socket on Windows'"};
 7491: 			       false ->
 7492: 				   ok
 7493: 				       end;
 7494: 		       _ ->
 7495: 			   ok
 7496: 		   end
 7497: 	   end,
 7498:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7499:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7500:                             Addr;
 7501:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7502:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7503:                     end
 7504:            end,
 7505:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) end,
 7506:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7507:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7508: 
 7509: do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) ->
 7510:     Ctrl = self(),
 7511:     ?P("[ctrl] create server process..."),
 7512:     Server = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) end),
 7513:     ?P("[ctrl] await server process ready..."),
 7514:     receive {Server, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7515: 
 7516:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server..."),
 7517:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7518:                             [binary,
 7519:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7520:                              {active,       false},
 7521:                              {packet,       4},
 7522:                              {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7523: 
 7524:     %% We use the undocumented feature that sending can be resumed after
 7525:     %% a send_timeout without any data loss if the peer starts to receive data.
 7526:     %% Unless of course the 7816-bug is in affect, in which case the write event
 7527:     %% for the socket is lost on windows and not all data is sent.
 7528: 
 7529:     ?P("[ctrl] begin sending..."),
 7530: 
 7531:     [otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, 18, BinSize, Server) ||
 7532: 	BinSize <- lists:seq(1000, 2000, 123)],
 7533: 
 7534:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - close socket"),
 7535: 
 7536:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7537:     ?P("[ctrl] stop server"),
 7538:     Server ! {self(), closed},
 7539:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 7540:     {Server, closed} = receive M -> M end,
 7541:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7542:     ok.
 7543: 
 7544: 
 7545: otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, BinNr, BinSize, Server) ->
 7546:     ?P("[ctrl] create payload (BinSz: ~w)...", [BinSize]),
 7547:     Data = lists:duplicate(BinNr, <<1:(BinSize*8)>>),
 7548:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info prior to start sending: "
 7549:        "~n      ~p", [inet:info(Socket)]),
 7550:     Ctrl   = self(),
 7551:     Client = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) end),
 7552:     SentBytes =
 7553: 	receive
 7554: 	    {Client, continue, Loops} ->
 7555: 		?P("[ctrl] received continue from client: ~p", [Loops]),
 7556: 		SB = Loops * BinNr * BinSize,
 7557: 		Server ! {self(), recv, SB},
 7558: 		SB
 7559: 	end,
 7560:     ct:sleep(1000),
 7561:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info after sending ~w bytes: "
 7562:        "~n      ~p", [SentBytes, inet:info(Socket)]),
 7563:     ?P("[ctrl] await server result..."),
 7564:     ok = receive
 7565: 	     {Server, SR} ->
 7566: 		 ?P("[ctrl] server result: ~p", [SR]),
 7567: 		 SR
 7568: 	 end,
 7569:     ?P("[ctrl] await client termination..."),
 7570:     ok = receive
 7571: 	     {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 7572: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client normal exit"),
 7573: 		 ok;
 7574: 	     {'EXIT', Client, CR} ->
 7575: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client unexpected exit reason: ~p", [CR]),
 7576: 		 CR
 7577: 	 end,
 7578:     ?P("[ctrl] done with BinSz: ~p", [BinSize]),
 7579:     ok.
 7580:     
 7581: 
 7582: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) ->
 7583:     otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, 0).
 7584: 
 7585: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops) ->
 7586:     ?P("[client] sending data (~w bytes, ~w)...", [iolist_size(Data), Loops]),
 7587:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 7588: 	ok ->
 7589: 	    otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops+1);
 7590: 
 7591: 	{error, timeout} when is_port(Socket) ->
 7592: 	    %% For the 'classic' sockets, when the OS buffers are
 7593: 	    %% full, the rest data are put into the (inet driver)
 7594: 	    %% internal, for later sending. SO, it can be counted
 7595: 	    %% as sent.
 7596: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p (+1)", [Loops]),
 7597: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7598: 	    exit(normal);
 7599: 
 7600: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7601: 	    %% For inet_backend = 'socket' when we nothing of the
 7602: 	    %% message was sent.
 7603: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p", [Loops]),
 7604: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops},
 7605: 	    exit(normal);
 7606: 
 7607: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7608: 	    %% A timeout means that **some** of the data was not sent,
 7609: 	    %% currently there is no way to know how much.
 7610: 	    %% NOTE THAT THIS MEANS THAT WE MAY HAVE A PARTIAL PACKAGE
 7611: 	    %% WRITTEN, INCLUDING A HEADER THAT INDICATES A DATA
 7612: 	    %% SIZE THAT IS **NOT** PRESENT!!
 7613: 	    %% So for this test case to work, we need to write the rest.
 7614: 	    %% But we cannot do that without first setting the package to raw.
 7615: 	    %%
 7616: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout"
 7617: 	       "~n      with ~w bytes of rest data"
 7618: 	       "~n      when Loops: ~p", [rest_data_size(RestData), Loops]),
 7619: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7620: 	    ?P("[client] packet to 'raw'..."),
 7621: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, raw}, {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7622: 	    ?P("[client] send ~w bytes of rest data...",
 7623: 	       [rest_data_size(RestData)]),
 7624: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, RestData),
 7625: 	    ?P("[client] packet (back) to '4'..."),
 7626: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, 4}, {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7627: 	    ?P("[client] done"),
 7628: 	    exit(normal)
 7629: 
 7630:     end.
 7631:     
 7632:     
 7633: otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7634:     ?P("[server] create listening socket"),
 7635:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,  {ip, Addr},
 7636:                                         {packet, 4},
 7637:                                         {active, false}]),
 7638:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7639:     ?P("[server] listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7640:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7641: 
 7642:     ?P("[server] accept connection..."),
 7643:     {ok, ASocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7644:     ?P("[server] connection accepted..."),
 7645:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7646: 
 7647:     otp_7816_server_loop(ASocket, Ctrl),
 7648: 
 7649:     ?P("[server] terminating").
 7650: 
 7651: 
 7652: otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl) ->
 7653:     ?P("[server] waiting for order..."),
 7654:     receive 
 7655: 	{Ctrl, recv, RecvBytes} -> 
 7656: 	    ?P("[server] start receiving (~w bytes)...", [RecvBytes]),
 7657: 
 7658: 	    ok = otp_7816_recv(Socket, RecvBytes),
 7659: 	    
 7660: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7661: 	    otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl);
 7662: 	
 7663: 	{Ctrl, closed} ->
 7664: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000),
 7665: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), closed}
 7666:     end.
 7667: 
 7668: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft) ->
 7669:     otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, 1).
 7670: 
 7671: otp_7816_recv(_, 0, _) ->
 7672:     ?P("[server] got all data"),
 7673:     ok;
 7674: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, N) ->
 7675:     ?P("[server,~w] try recv (~p bytes left)", [N, BytesLeft]),
 7676:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7677: 	{ok, Bin} when (byte_size(Bin) =< BytesLeft) andalso
 7678: 		       (byte_size(Bin) > 0) -> 
 7679: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received ~p of ~p bytes",
 7680: 	       [N, size(Bin), BytesLeft]),
 7681: 	    otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft - byte_size(Bin), N+1);
 7682: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 7683: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received unexpected data: "
 7684: 	       "~n   Expected:    ~p bytes"
 7685: 	       "~n   Received:    ~p bytes"
 7686: 	       "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
 7687: 	       [N, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin), inet:info(Socket)]),
 7688: 	    {error, {unexpected_data, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin)}};
 7689: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7690: 	    ?P("[server,~w] got receive timeout when expecting more data:"
 7691: 	       "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N,inet:info(Socket)]),
 7692: 	    {error, timeout}
 7693:     end.
 7694: 
 7695: 
 7696: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 7697: 
 7698: %% Receive a packet with a faulty packet header.
 7699: otp_8102(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7700:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7701:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7702:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7703:                             Addr;
 7704:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7705:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7706:                     end
 7707:            end,
 7708:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) end,
 7709:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7710:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7711: 
 7712: do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) ->
 7713:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7714:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7715:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7716: 
 7717:     [otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, otp_8102_packet(Type, Size))
 7718:      || Size <- lists:seq(-10,-1), 
 7719: 	Type <- [4, {cdr,big}, {cdr,little}]],
 7720:     
 7721:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7722:     ok.
 7723: 
 7724: otp_8102_packet(4, Size) ->
 7725:     {<<Size:32/big>>, 4};
 7726: otp_8102_packet({cdr,big}, Size) ->
 7727:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,0,0,Size:32/big>>, cdr};
 7728: otp_8102_packet({cdr,little}, Size) ->
 7729:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,1,0,Size:32/little>>, cdr}.
 7730: 
 7731: otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, {Bin,PType}) ->
 7732: 
 7733:     ?P("Connect with packet option ~p ...",[PType]),
 7734:     {ok, RSocket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum, [binary,
 7735:                                                      {ip,     Addr},
 7736:                                                      {packet, PType},
 7737:                                                      {active, true}]),
 7738:     {ok, SSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7739: 
 7740:     ?P("Got connection, sending ~p...",[Bin]),
 7741: 
 7742:     ok = gen_tcp:send(SSocket, Bin),
 7743: 
 7744:     ?P("Sending complete...",[]),
 7745: 
 7746:     {tcp_error,RSocket,emsgsize} = receive M -> M end,
 7747: 
 7748:     ?P("Got error msg, ok."),
 7749:     gen_tcp:close(SSocket),    
 7750:     gen_tcp:close(RSocket).
 7751: 
 7752: %% Verify packet_size handles long HTTP header lines.
 7753: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7754:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7755:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7756:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7757:                             Addr;
 7758:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7759:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7760:                     end
 7761:            end,
 7762:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) end,
 7763:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7764:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7765: 
 7766: do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) ->
 7767:     {ok, LS} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 7768:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 7769:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LS, PortNum]),
 7770:     OrigLinkHdr = "/" ++ string:chars($S, 8192),
 7771:     _Server = spawn_link(
 7772:                 fun() ->
 7773:                         {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 7774:                         ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet_size, 16384}]),
 7775:                         ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr),
 7776:                         ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 7777:                 end),
 7778:     {ok, S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7779:                        [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7780:     Req = "GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n"
 7781:         ++ "Host: " ++ inet_parse:ntoa(Addr) ++ "\r\n"
 7782:         ++ "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7783:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Req),
 7784:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, http}]),
 7785:     {ok, {http_response, {1,1}, 200, "OK"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7786:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, httph}, {packet_size, 16384}]),
 7787:     {ok, {http_header, _, 'Content-Length', _, "0"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7788:     {ok, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7789:     true = (LinkHdr == OrigLinkHdr),
 7790:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7791:     ok = gen_tcp:close(LS),
 7792:     ok.
 7793: 
 7794: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr) ->
 7795:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once},{packet,http}]),
 7796:     receive
 7797:         {http, S, {http_request, 'GET', _, _}} ->
 7798:             ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, undefined)
 7799:     after
 7800:         3000 ->
 7801:             error({timeout,request_line})
 7802:     end.
 7803: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok) ->
 7804:     Resp = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-length: 0\r\n" ++
 7805:         "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7806:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Resp);
 7807: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State) ->
 7808:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once}, {packet,httph}]),
 7809:     receive
 7810:         {http, S, http_eoh} ->
 7811:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok);
 7812:         {http, S, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} ->
 7813:             LinkHdr = OrigLinkHdr,
 7814:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7815:         {http, S, {http_header, _, _Hdr, _, _Val}} ->
 7816:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7817:         {http, S, {http_error, Err}} ->
 7818:             error({error, Err})
 7819:     after
 7820:         3000 ->
 7821:             error({timeout,header})
 7822:     end.
 7823: 
 7824: wrapping_oct() ->
 7825:     [{timetrap, {minutes,20}}].
 7826: 
 7827: %% Check that 64bit octet counters work.
 7828: wrapping_oct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7829:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7830:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7831:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7832:                             Addr;
 7833:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7834:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7835:                     end
 7836:            end,
 7837:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) end,
 7838:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7839:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7840: 
 7841: %% {recbuf, 8192}, {sndbuf, 8192}
 7842: do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) ->
 7843:     ?P("[ctrl] create listen socket"),
 7844:     Ctrl = self(),
 7845:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{mode,binary}]),
 7846:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 7847:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn acceptor"),
 7848:     Acceptor = spawn_link(fun() -> oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) end),
 7849:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn pump"),
 7850:     Pump     = spawn_link(fun() -> 
 7851:                                   oct_datapump(Ctrl,
 7852:                                                Config, Addr, LPort, 16#10000FFFF)
 7853:                           end),
 7854:     ?P("[ctrl] await acceptor socket"),
 7855:     ASock = wc_await_socket("acceptor", Acceptor),
 7856:     ?P("[ctrl] await pump socket"),
 7857:     PSock = wc_await_socket("pump", Pump),
 7858:     ?P("[ctrl] await completion (from pump)"),
 7859:     Res = wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock),
 7860:     ?P("[ctrl] close listen socket"),
 7861:     gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 7862:     ?P("[ctrl] verify result"),
 7863:     ok = Res,
 7864:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7865:     ok.
 7866: 
 7867: wc_await_socket(Tag, Pid) ->
 7868:     receive
 7869:         {Pid, socket, AS} ->
 7870:             ?P("received ~s socket: "
 7871:                "~n      ~p", [Tag, AS]),
 7872:             AS
 7873:     end.
 7874: 
 7875: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock) ->
 7876:     wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, 1, undefined).
 7877: 
 7878: wc_await_completion(undefined = _Acceptor, _ASock,
 7879:                     undefined = _Pump,     _PSock, 
 7880:                     Loops, Res) ->
 7881:     ?P("completed after ~w loops", [Loops]),
 7882:     Res;
 7883: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, Loops, CRes) ->
 7884:     receive
 7885:         {'EXIT', Pump, Res} ->
 7886:             ?P("[ctrl] Received pump exit: "
 7887:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7888:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7889:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7890:                                 undefined, PSock,
 7891:                                 Loops + 1, Res);
 7892:         {'EXIT', Acceptor, Res} ->
 7893:             ?P("[ctrl] Received acceptor exit: "
 7894:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7895:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7896:             wc_await_completion(undefined, ASock,
 7897:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7898:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7899:                 
 7900:     after 10000 ->
 7901:             ASockInfo = wc_sock_info(ASock),
 7902:             AccInfo   = wc_proc_info(Acceptor),
 7903:             PSockInfo = wc_sock_info(PSock),
 7904:             PumpInfo  = wc_proc_info(Pump),
 7905:             ?P("Info ~w while waiting for clompletion: "
 7906:                "~n   Acceptor Socket Info: ~p"
 7907:                "~n   Acceptor Info:        ~p"
 7908:                "~n   Pump Socket Info:     ~p"
 7909:                "~n   Pump Info:            ~p",
 7910:                [Loops, ASockInfo, AccInfo, PSockInfo, PumpInfo]),
 7911:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7912:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7913:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7914:     end.
 7915:             
 7916: wc_sock_info(S) ->
 7917:     try inet:info(S)
 7918:     catch
 7919:         _:_:_ ->
 7920:             undefined
 7921:     end.
 7922: 
 7923: wc_proc_info(P) when is_pid(P) ->
 7924:     try erlang:process_info(P)
 7925:     catch
 7926:         _:_:_ ->
 7927:             undefined
 7928:     end;
 7929: wc_proc_info(_) ->
 7930:     undefined.
 7931: 
 7932: %% {recbuf, 16*1024}, {sndbuf, 16*1024}
 7933: oct_datapump(Ctrl, Config, Addr, Port, N) ->
 7934:     ?P("[pump] connect to listener"),
 7935:     {ok, CSock} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 7936: 			   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {mode, binary}]),
 7937:     ?P("[pump] announce to ctrl"),
 7938:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, CSock},
 7939:     {ok, [{sndbuf,SndBuf}]} = inet:getopts(CSock, [sndbuf]),
 7940:     ?P("[pump] connected - start 'pumping' with"
 7941:        "~n      SndBuf: ~w", [SndBuf]),
 7942:     put(action,  nothing),
 7943:     put(sent,    0),
 7944:     put(elapsed, 0),
 7945:     put(rem_bytes, N),
 7946:     oct_pump(CSock, N, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>,100000), 0, 0).
 7947: 
 7948: oct_pump(S, N, _, _, _Sent) when N =< 0 ->
 7949:     ?P("[pump] done"),
 7950:     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7951:     exit(ok);
 7952: oct_pump(S, N, Bin, Last, Sent) ->
 7953:     put(action, send),
 7954:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 7955:     Res     = gen_tcp:send(S, Bin),
 7956:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 7957:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 7958:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 7959:     put(action,  sent),
 7960:     put(sent,    Sent+1),
 7961:     case Res of
 7962: 	ok ->
 7963: 	    case inet:getstat(S) of
 7964: 		{ok, Stat} ->
 7965: 		    {_, R} = lists:keyfind(send_oct, 1, Stat),
 7966: 		    case (R < Last) of
 7967: 			true ->
 7968: 			    ?P("[pump] send counter error ~p < ~p", [R, Last]),
 7969:                             (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7970: 			    exit({error, {output_counter, R, Last, N}});
 7971: 			false ->
 7972:                             put(rem_bytes, N - byte_size(Bin)),
 7973: 			    oct_pump(S, N-byte_size(Bin), Bin, R, Sent+1)
 7974: 		    end;
 7975: 		{error, StatReason} ->
 7976: 		    ?P("[pump] get stat failed:"
 7977: 		       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 7978: 		       "~n   when"
 7979: 		       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 7980: 		       "~n      Last:      ~p", [StatReason, N, Last]),
 7981: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7982: 		    exit({error, {stat_failure, StatReason, N, Last}})
 7983: 	    end;
 7984: 	{error, SendReason} ->
 7985: 	    ?P("[pump] send failed:"
 7986: 	       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 7987: 	       "~n   when"
 7988: 	       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 7989: 	       "~n      Last:      ~p", [SendReason, N, Last]),
 7990: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7991: 	    exit({error, {send_failure, SendReason, N, Last}})
 7992:     end.
 7993:     
 7994: 
 7995: oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) ->
 7996:     ?P("[acceptor] accept connection"),
 7997:     {ok, ASock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 7998:     ?P("[acceptor] announce to ctrl"),
 7999:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, ASock},
 8000:     {ok, [{recbuf,RecBuf}]} = inet:getopts(ASock, [recbuf]),
 8001:     ?P("[acceptor] connection accepted - start receiving with: "
 8002:        "~n      RecBuf: ~w", [RecBuf]),
 8003:     put(action,  nothing),
 8004:     put(recv,    0),
 8005:     put(elapsed, 0),
 8006:     oct_aloop(ASock, inet:info(ASock), 0, 0).
 8007: 
 8008: oct_aloop(S, LastInfo, Received, Times) ->
 8009:     put(action, recv),
 8010:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8011:     Res     = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 8012:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 8013:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 8014:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 8015:     put(action,  received),
 8016:     put(recv,    Times+1),
 8017:     case Res of
 8018: 	{ok, _} ->
 8019:             #{counters := #{recv_oct := R} = _Stat} = Info = inet:info(S),
 8020:             case (R < Received) of
 8021:                 true ->
 8022:                     ?P("[acceptor] recv counter error:"
 8023:                        "~n      Recv Cnt:  ~p"
 8024:                        "~n      Received:  ~p"
 8025:                        "~n      Times:     ~p"
 8026:                        "~n      Info:      ~p"
 8027:                        "~n      Last Info: ~p",
 8028:                        [R, Received, Times, Info, LastInfo]),
 8029:                     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8030:                     {error, {output_counter, R, Received, Times}};
 8031:                 false ->
 8032:                     case Times rem 16#FFFFF of
 8033:                         0 ->
 8034:                             ?P("[acceptor] read: ~p"
 8035:                                "~n      Times: ~w"
 8036:                                "~n      Info:  ~p",
 8037:                                [R, Times, Info]);
 8038:                         _ ->
 8039:                             ok
 8040:                     end,
 8041:                     oct_aloop(S, Info, R, Times+1)
 8042:             end;
 8043: 
 8044: 	{error, RecvReason} ->
 8045: 	    ?P("[acceptor] receive failed:"
 8046: 	       "~n      Reason:   ~p"
 8047: 	       "~n   when"
 8048: 	       "~n      Received: ~p"
 8049: 	       "~n      Times:    ~p", [RecvReason, Received, Times]),
 8050: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8051:             ct:sleep(1000), % Just give the 'pump' a chance to get there first
 8052: 	    exit(closed)
 8053:     end.
 8054: 
 8055: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 8056:

 8058: %%%     "@"++Host = lists:dropwhile(fun(C) -> C =/= $@ end, atom_to_list(Name)),
 8059: %%%     Host.
